SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_000.text:
Hi there! So what goes on
in this part of the base?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, the alien is in our midst! It's been a
great many cycles since an outsider last
visited us, so I suppose I could spare the
time to explain what 'goes on,' as you say.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_020.text:
This is the laboratory of Green Division,
where we research various forms of life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_040.text:
The research of fiends and monsters
falls under the purview of Red Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_050.text:
We in Green Division collect unusual life-forms
from various worlds, as well as flora and fauna
with medicinal properties. We also pursue
research into the fundaments of life itself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_060.text:
In fact, all the food, medical supplies,
and biologically derived fuels consumed
within the base are created here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh, so this isn't just a research lab!
You do all sorts of stuff here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_080.text:
Yes, although research remains our division's
primary mission—which is why we have little
time to waste engaging with aliens.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_090.text:
Currently, I am only speaking with you because
I have an idle moment while I await the receipt
of some quantum cat specimens. Speaking of
which, why haven't they arrived yet?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_100.text:
Quantum cats? Wait, could those
specimens include MY cat!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_110.text:
Not to imply that I don't trust you, alien,
but we have valuable research samples
under our care, so I would ask you not to
go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_120.text:
Alternatively, if you would consent to our
examining you, injecting you with chemicals,
and then dissecting you, I'm certain there's
much of interest we could learn.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_130.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_130.text: Gya! Hard no on that! So sorry to have bothered you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Er, are you talking to me?
Is something wrong?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes. I, um... Well, I actually wanted
to ask you a favor? Kind of?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, I'm one of the researchers
from Green Division, by the way.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_040.text: Do you people get what 'hard no' means? No injections! No dissections! And no amount of asking is going to make me change my mind!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_050.text:
What? Oh no! Nothing like that!
The favor actually involves catching
some quantum cats that ran away
from me down on the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_060.text:
...Oh. Yeah, I think the overseer
mentioned something about those.
They're below us somewhere?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Exactly! Those naughty cats ran away just as
I was preparing them for an experiment.
And if my division overseer hears of this...
Oh, I don't even want to think about it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Mmm, yeah, we've met. She does not
seem like someone I'd want to be on
the wrong side of.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_090.text: I can't even imagine what she might do if she found out I lost her cats!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_091.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_091.text:
Last time I screwed up, she made me participate in
an experiment involving an elixir that was supposed
to make you smart, but I'm so dumb that not even
that could—wait, that doesn't matter right now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_100.text:
I mean, I doubt your quantum cats include
the one I'm looking for, but it's still hard
not to get excited about a new type of kitty!
So what are these fuzzballs like?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_110.text:
There are two escaped cats: one named
Schrö, and the other named Dinger. But there is also only one escaped cat.
They are multiple, yet singular.
Deathless, yet not.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Quantum cats possess a mimetic ability
that causes other life-forms around them
to assume their appearance. As such, we have reports that the cat—
or cats—are hiding among fiends who now
ALSO appear to be quantum cats.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_130.text:
I asked a couple other lab workers to help
me capture the cats—er, or cat—but they all
ended up being attacked by monsters.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Man, finding the real quantum cats in a base
full of fake quantum cats doesn't sound easy.
Is there really no way to tell them apart?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_150.text:
According to our research, quantum cats
are influenced by magnetic fields.
They cause real cats to face to the right,
and illusory cats to face to the left.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_160.text: Oh, well now it sounds easy! Don't worry, I'll have your little cats herded up in no time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Yes, well, now that I've explained all of that,
I'm coming with you. You wouldn't be able to
use the lift without me, is the thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_171.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_171.text:
Oh, and my name's Qu Magis,
but you can call me Mags.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Cat sighted! Think that's one
of your quantum ones?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Did you verify which direction
it was facing?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
It was facing right, right?
Or was it facing right, wrong?
Aaargh! I don't knooow!

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_000.text:
So this fuzzball we caught here
is one of your quantum cats?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_010.text:
It says 'Dinger' on its collar,
so it must be. Oh, what a relief
that we caught the right cat!

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_020.text:
It didn't even try to scratch us
or anything! That's a good kitty.
You're a gooooood kitty!

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_030.text: Ah, but the quantum cat you see isn't real. It's the cat you don't perceive that is the actual cat—one living on the boundary between dimensions.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_040.text:
Wait, you're saying that if I can see it,
I can't catch it? But I DID catch it!
It's right here! So how does that work?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_050.text:
It's the collar. It's made of orichalcum,
which for some reason makes it possible
to interact with quantum cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_060.text:
So these are the type of creatures
Green Division researches?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh yes! We have much to learn from them.
Why, they could easily lead to a new era
of massive technological discoveries!

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_090.text:
Exactly! Er, why else did you think
we were researching life-forms?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_100.text:
I dunno. To find the secret
of immortality or something?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_110.text:
Oooh, that's a great guess!
Yeah, I've kind of got the same hunch
that might be the end goal in all this.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_130.text:
Honestly, though? I don't think being
immortal would be very much fun.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_140.text:
Uh, we should probably
move on to the next cat.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_010.text:
Let's see... The collar says 'Schrö'!
Oh, wow, what a relief.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_020.text:
It's so cute! Although it does look
pretty much identical to Dinger.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_030.text: Well, they are the same cat, after all. There's two of them, yet just one. Dead, yet living. Existing, yet not.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_040.text: So what sort of experiment does Green Division have in mind for these—er, this—cat?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_050.text:
The fact they exist as a single cat and yet
two cats means they exist in a quantum state—
and are therefore connected at a quantum-
mechanical level.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_060.text:
I'll nod slowly to pretend to know what
that means. And it's useful because...?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_070.text:
I think we're doing something like trying to
control their state with orichalcum—to find out
if it's structured in a way that we can extract
energy from them without it diminishing?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_080.text:
So you don't understand how
the experiment works either?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_090.text:
Ha ha! Oh, I don't have the faintest
idea about most of this stuff.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_100.text:
Well, at least we caught
the little furballs!

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_110.text:
And the monsters seem to
have disappeared too!

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_120.text:
Indeed they have. This is because the
influence of the cats' quantum field
has dissipated.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_130.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_130.text:
Phew! Not having a bunch of fake cats
around will make finding my real one
a heck of a lot easier.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_140.text:
I'll go back to the lab and
drop off the cat... Er, or cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_150.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_150.text: Hope your overseer goes easy on you!

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_160.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_160.text: Guess I should head back too.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_000.text:
These mimetic monsters—or whatever
you called them—don't actually look
all that much like cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_010.text:
Yes, they seem to be projecting their
existence through space-time? That's why
it changes their left-right directionality.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_020.text:
We speak of the cats in the multiple,
but in truth, they're singular.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_030.text: And it's possible that anyone other than the two of us would actually perceive us as cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_000.text:
That was a mimetic thingy!
Er, right?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_010.text:
It sure was. Now let's get moving
and find those quantum cats!

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_020.text:
Maybe we could lure out the
real ones with catnip?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_040.text:
It's an herb cats find irresistible!
Also, remind me which of us is supposed
to be an expert in the sciences?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_000.text:
That was a mimetic thingy!
Er, right?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_010.text:
It sure was. Now let's get moving
and find those quantum cats!

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_020.text:
Yeah, before your overseer
blows her top at you.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_030.text:
Oh, you have no idea.
She is terrifying.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_000.text:
That was a mimetic thingy!
Er, right?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_010.text:
The cats really did manage to project
their appearance onto the monsters...

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_020.text: It makes me wonder if quantum cats are simply creatures onto which normal cats have projected their appearances.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_030.text:
If that's the case, how would we
ever know what anything looks like?

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_040.text:
But it DOES make for a very
interesting thought exercise!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_000.text:
You get those quantum cats back
where they needed to be?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
I did, thanks to you. Now our biological
research can move forward without issue.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Great! Well, good luck
with your research, Mags.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
But, um, seeing as you were such a helpful
alien, do you think I could maybe ask you
for another favor? I mean, if I need it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_040.text: Oh, I suppose I'll consider it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, the alien. Thankfully, we have a researcher
whose duties include interfacing with those
from outside the division, so let me just... Oh, bother. I don't see her anywhere. Tsk!
Well then, I guess it falls to me, the
overseer of the entire Green Division,
to assuage your idle curiosity... Joy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_020.text:
Holy yikes, didn't mean to ruin your day
or anything. If you don't want to explain, 
I'll just walk around and see for myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_030.text:
Just make sure you pay attention!
Now then, we in Green Division
conduct biological research.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_040.text:
Our field is a broad one, spanning everything
from the life-forms that live here on Delta Base
to the interdimensional beings that exist in
the space between worlds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_050.text:
We cover everything from organic chemistry to
life sciences to particle physics, and demand
an incredibly wide breadth of knowledge—
certainly the largest in all of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_060.text:
Sounds like some pretty
high-level stuff.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_070.text:
Just so, which is why I'm proud to say every
member of Green Division is an exceptional
researcher! ...Well, save for a small few.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_080.text:
Now then, alien. As we have valuable research
samples under our care, I would ask you not
to go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_090.text:
Alternatively, if you would consent to our
examining you, injecting you with chemicals,
and then dissecting you, I'm certain there's
much of interest we could learn.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_100.text:
Totally good here, thanks!
I'll come back some other time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_000.text: Oops! Oh dear, I'm so sorry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_010.text:
You okay? Seems like you're
in a real big rush.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, it's nothing. Or, well... Okay, here it is: on the lower level, we're
currently cultivating and researching these
otherworldly vegetables called monophids
that we use to make food and medicine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_050.text:
I take it these otherworldly veggies
are different from the normal kind?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, very much so. In fact, you have to
be REALLY careful with the type and
amount of fertilizer you give them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_070.text:
But I sort of...didn't do that?
And now they've turned into monsters
that are propagating exponentially.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Considering their current rate of growth,
they'll soon overrun the entire lower level!
And if Green Division's overseer happens
to find out about this...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Oh, I can't even imagine what she'll do!
Last time I messed up, she injected me with
an experimental mushroom extract that was
supposed to let you go days without sleep! And the time before that, she...
Well, you get the idea.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_110.text:
But say, you're an alien, right? Would you 
be willing to help me exterminate our now
rapidly expanding monophid population?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Monophids, huh? Yikes. But also, there's a chance my cat's
down there, so sure. Why not?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Thank you so much! Oh, and I should mention
that the monophids have developed an abnormal
property in which they scream when they perceive
danger. So, um, be careful of that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Well, that's certainly otherworldly!
Although it does complicate things.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Oh, it's all kinds of trouble! In fact,
according to past records, all the research 
teams that tried to deal with these kinds
of infestations suffered MASSIVE casualties.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Still, if we could emit something at the same
wavelength as the monophids' screams,
we might be able to cancel them out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Oh, so they have a weakness! Neat!
If we can find a way to exploit that,
we'll have this thing done in no time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Let's go, Mags! ...Huh. I just got
the strangest sense that I've said
and done something like this before.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Gaaah! The screaming!
I guess this is one of your monophids?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I thought I was prepared for it,
but it still feels like my head
is splitting apart!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Plants ought to keep their mouths shut!
Er, or not have them in the first place.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_010.text:
It looks like it's screaming,
but the sound is being canceled out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_020.text: We should be able to gather them now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_000.text:
One screaming turnip down!
So hey, why are you researching 
these awful things, anyway?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_010.text:
Screaming aside, monophids have a lot
of vitality—and their seeds are quite
rich in various nutrients.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_020.text:
I mean, sure—but they still seem like
super dangerous plants to cultivate.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, this time it was my own dumb fault
for messing up the fertilizer. And the
reproductivity was probably a result of
all the selective breeding! Heh heh...heh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_040.text:
But do you know why Green Division is
trying to uncover the secrets of life?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_080.text:
Even if they did find some way,
it'd probably require a weird surgery.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_100.text:
Nooo, don't even joke about that!
Let's just hurry on, okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Even when I know it's coming,
it still disturbs me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_020.text: Let's just shut it up already!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_010.text:
Hey, so don't let anyone know
I told you this, but...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_020.text:
Ooo! You gonna give me more
hot goss from the divisions?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_030.text:
As far as I know, this is the first time
we've dealt with an outsider like you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_040.text:
But on the lower level, there's apparently
someone who isn't a member of Green Division
or any other division!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_050.text:
Like a ghost or something, I guess.
And while I kind of want to see them,
I also kind of...don't?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_060.text:
So even smarties from the life
sciences division believe in ghosts?
Kinda surprising, actually.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_070.text:
Look, I just want to get that last
monophid before the ghost appears!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_080.text:
Really? 'Cause I'd kind of like to
meet the mysterious creature that
lurks in the lower level! Er, but then again, maybe not.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_000.text:
You know, I wonder if I could shut this
dang monophid up with my magic?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Actually, I've grown to like the screams.
It kind of makes me wish I could hear
YOU scream sometime, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_020.text:
...Ew. Just hold on there, Ameya.
Get your magic back and then get
out of this crazy pants situation.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_020.text:
I didn't want to mention this earlier,
but a colleague of mine was actually
killed by one of the monophids.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_030.text:
Yeah, that's the sort of thing I would
have wanted to know before we started
this screaming-veggie search.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_040.text:
Yeah, I didn't want to worry you while we were
hunting them down. Er, but now that I know you,
I bet you would have helped me even if you HAD
known, 'cause that's the kind of alien you are.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_050.text:
Darn it, Mags! How am I
supposed to deny that!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_000.text: That should be the last of 'em.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, I've got a lot of processing to do
on these guys, so I'm going to head back
to the upper level. Thanks again, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_000.text:
Thank you so much for helping me
with that whole monophid thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_010.text:
We only managed to recover one of them,
but that's still one more than none!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_020.text:
Um, so if anything else goes wrong,
can I ask for your help again?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_030.text: Oh, I suppose I'll consider it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_040.text:
Thanks. Oh, and here's your reward
for helping me out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_051_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_051_CUT_000_010.text:
We managed to recover two monophids.
That's wonderful!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_052_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_052_CUT_000_010.text:
We recovered all the monophids,
which should ensure that we're able
to go forward with our research.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_010.text:
Sadly, we had to eradicate all the monophids,
but I'll try to recover the specimens from
the carcasses; we grew them in good soil,
so even dead, they're full of nutrients.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_040.text:
I guess this turned out to be more about
exterminating monophids than recovering them.
But hey, you still get a reward for that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_000.text:
Hi there! So, uh, this is quite the
sketchy looking facility you've got.
What exactly do you do here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, look. It's the alien. Also, what you consider to be 'sketchy' is,
in fact, reputable and cutting-edge research
spanning everything from the life sciences
to quantum mechanics.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_020.text:
And does that include, say,
cats that possess magical energy?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_030.text:
The research of fiends, monsters,
and the like falls under the purview
of Red Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_040.text:
We in Green Division collect unusual life-forms
from various worlds, as well as flora and fauna
with medicinal properties. We also pursue
research into the fundaments of life itself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_050.text:
But our research is not merely academic
in nature; we are equally devoted to
researching practical ways to improve
the quality of life here in Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_060.text:
So you're saying you do all
sorts of stuff besides research.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_070.text:
Quite right. Green Division's researchers
are the best of the best, and they undertake
their work with meticulous care.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_080.text:
Now then, alien. As we have valuable research
samples under our care, I would ask you not
to go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_090.text:
In fact, I'm planning to begin an experiment
involving some new specimens shortly—
assuming they ever arrive, that is.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_100.text: I do hope there hasn't been another mistake. Ugh. I've half a mind to make a research specimen out of her one of these days...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_110.text:
Alternatively, if you would consent to our
examining you, injecting you with chemicals,
and then dissecting you, I'm certain there's
much of interest we could learn.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_120.text:
Totally good here, thanks!
I'll come back some other time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_130.text: See to it that you do.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_020.text: Oh no! And I broke your jar!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh no! They escaped!
The tsuchinoko have escaped!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_050.text: Tsuchinoko? Like, those tsuchinoko? The snake things?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Yeah, they're all stretchy, but also
kinda chubby. Sorta cute, actually!
Also, I think they're pretty rare?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_090.text:
And that's what was inside your jar?
Man, I'm SO sorry about all this!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Yeah. And the bigger problem is that
I'm a researcher for Green Division,
and if the overseer finds out I lost
our tsuchinoko specimens...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Yes, exactly! Why, just the other day, 
she almost made me do a gene transplant
with an electric eel!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Er, but I guess that's beside the point.
Will you please help me recover them?
I mean, it WAS kind of your fault.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_140.text:
There were three specimens in the jar,
and they probably fled to the lower level.
Don't worry, I'll come with you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Also, tsuchinoko snore when they sleep,
so that'll be the easiest time to try
and recapture them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Here, let me activate that
lift over there for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_180.text:
I'm really sorry, Mags.
I swear it was an accident.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching it
without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Should we try to catch
the tsuchinoko?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_020.text:
And it's sound asleep.
Aw, so cute!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_030.text: This is our chance to catch it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_010.text:
But we still have two to go.
I'm counting on you, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_020.text:
What are you planning to do
with these things, anyway?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Never mind that. Listen, do you find it
at all strange that you ALSO call these
creatures tsuchinoko?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, it would be proof that they exist
on multiple worlds—and yet, there are
no records of anyone ever releasing them
into another world!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_060.text:
I suppose they might jump into other dimensions
when they sense danger? I mean, that would also
explain why we haven't been able to get accurate
data on their native habitat or population.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_070.text:
Interesting theory, but it doesn't
explain why they have the same name
on multiple worlds—I mean, unless they
TOLD people their names!? Hey, little guy! Can you talk?
C'mon, say, 'I'm a tsuchinoko!'

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_080.text:
Well, perhaps our habit of calling them tsuchinoko
spread to other worlds—or maybe a member of the
civilization that named them found their way here.
Either explanation could work, honestly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_090.text:
And if some sort of internal organ allows them to
jump between dimensions instead of magic or tech,
it would be possible for the same population to
exist on multiple worlds at once.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_100.text:
And maybe that's why they're so chubby:
they've got a warp device in there!
Man, I bet even the Arch Witch
couldn't see that one coming.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_110.text:
If the same individual tsuchinoko truly did
exist on multiple worlds at once, that would
make them living, breathing, interdimensional
teleportation devices!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_120.text:
And THAT means researching their species
could provide valuable clues for the
development of teleportation technology!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_130.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_130.text:
Wow, tsuchinoko are more impressive than
I thought. And you're pretty impressive
too, Mags, thinking of all this stuff!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_140.text:
Aw, thank you so much
for saying that! You know, if we ever do get our
interdimensional teleportation up
and running, I'd love to visit your
world one day, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_150.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_150.text:
And I'd love to show you around
the Witchdom of Pulchra!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_160.text:
Also, I know I'm always going on about
myself, but I really would like to hear
more about your world next time!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_170.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_170.text: Mags? I could blow your mind.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_120_CUT_010_000.text:
Heh. That's a tsuchinoko for you.
Little guys sure are squirrely!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching this
guy without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_030.text: This is our chance to grab it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_000.text:
Got it! Also probably best I don't get
too attached, 'cause I'm guessing you
won't let me take it home.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_040.text:
So, um, alien? Were you serious about
wanting to keep one of these?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_050.text:
I dunno. A little bit, I guess?
I mean, it IS weirdly cute—although
LoLo would probably freak out if I came
back with something like this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_060.text:
I see. Sadly, these specimens are very precious
to us, so we can't let you take one with you.
Also, no photographs, flash or otherwise.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_070.text:
I know, I know... Although I bet I
COULD cram one of 'em into a pocket!
Heh heh heh...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_080.text:
Er, are you all right, alien?
You're mumbling. A lot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_090.text:
What!? Huh!? No! How dare you!
Let's just keep going.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_300_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching it
without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_310_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_310_CUT_000_020.text:
And looks like it's having
itself a snooze.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_310_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_310_CUT_000_030.text: This is our chance to catch it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_000.text:
We caught the last tsuchinoko!
Uh, that WAS all of 'em, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_010.text:
Yep! We're all done. Now I'm gonna
run on up and get these processed,
so I'll see you later.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks again for your help
with the tsuchinoko.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_010.text:
Least I could do, considering it was my
fault in the first place. Plus, I got to
cuddle with a real live tsuchinoko,
and that was AWESOME.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_020.text:
I take it physical contact is an important
aspect of culture on your world, alien.
I don't understand why you're so satisfied
at having touched something.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_030.text:
Touching animals is very healing—whether
they're soft and fluffy, or slimy and lumpy!
Speaking of, were you able to get what you
needed from Mr. Tsuchinoko?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_000.text:
We were able to capture all
three in healthy condition.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_010.text:
Striking while they slept
made 'em easy to catch.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_020.text:
I'm just glad our research into the life
of the tsuchinoko can proceed smoothly.
Thanks again for the help!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_030.text:
It was actually kind of fun!
I just hope your overseer doesn't
find out about all this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_000.text:
Not all of them made it
back to us unharmed...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_010.text:
They put up a bit of a fight,
so I did what I had to do...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_020.text:
Still, I don't think that should have
a significant effect on our research.
Thank you for your help.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_030.text:
It was actually kind of fun!
I just hope your overseer doesn't
find out about all this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_000.text:
The three of them are all
a little bit beaten up...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, those things were WAY
more ferocious than I expected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_020.text:
Still, it's not like we had a choice,
so thanks all the same, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_030.text:
It was actually kind of fun!
I just hope your overseer doesn't
find out about all this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thank you for helping to retrieve those
rare specimens, alien. All of us in Green
Division owe you a debt.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I do—and I apologize for the trouble
my researcher Qu Magis caused for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Um... Thank you for
your help, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_050.text:
The overseer was quite furious with me.
She made it clear that since my negligence
put all of Delta Base at risk, I should have
reported the incident to her immediately.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_060.text:
On that topic, alien, I wonder if you
might be willing to join us for a
selective-breeding experiment?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_070.text:
No way, lady! I'm not gonna be
your experimental guinea pig! Also, I don't NEED any enhancements,
thank you very much.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_080.text:
This is not about breeding you, alien.
We're seeking to fuse the specimens
you helped recover with a magical bee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_090.text:
We intend to fuse their individual
characteristics to create a new
and beneficial life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_100.text: As I would hate for your impression of Green Division to be tainted by certain members of our research team, you may consider this a chance to see the kind of work we really do.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh! Well, in that case,
count me in!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_000.text:
Then please go observe our experiment.
You can find it on the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Beginning selective-breeding verification
experiment A, iteration 880.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to use the inherent abilities
of quantum cats to increase the bee's
propagation rate and honey production.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_020.text:
We once more stand at the brink of
uncovering a core mystery of nature
and enriching our own way of life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_030.text:
So I guess fusing different animals
together is just something people
do in this world?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_040.text:
We can instantly create new life-forms
by combining specimens that have been
placed in these fusion pods.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_050.text:
And by applying our teleportation
technology, we turn them into a
new, single being!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic elements
of the quantum cat and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_070.text:
When you hear the pod ding,
the work will be complete.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_080.text:
This all just feels so...tawdry.
I sure hope it's safe.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Creature_303
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_140.text:
WE MUST       WE WILL
     TURN THIS   INTO
   NEST

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Oh no... No no no no no... Not good! We overshot the domesticity
level and made it intelligent!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Creature_303
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_160.text:
KREE KREE KREE.
FLEE FROM US.
FLEE. FLEE. FLEE.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_170.text:
So on a scale of complete success to
utter failure... Maybe a six? Anyway, this is getting dangerous!
Let's get out of here!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_180.text:
On second thought, I should really
just find my cat and get the heck
out of here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to boost the medicinal properties
of monophids and propagation rates of
honeybees, as well as increasing the
yields of honey and so forth.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic
elements of the monophid and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to boost the special faculties of
tsuchinoko and propagation rates of honeybees,
as well as increasing the yields of honey
and so forth.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic elements
of the tsuchinoko and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_000.text:
I'm not sure what went wrong, but they
appear to have fused into a rather
dangerous-looking creature.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_010.text:
...Mags? What culture solution
did you use in the pods?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_030.text:
My instructions were to use formulation 098.
But sadly, I cannot afford to waste
precious time chastising you now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_040.text:
It is possible the specimens have begun
constructing a hive on the lower floor.
Should they gain even more intelligence,
it could put all of Delta Base in danger.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Also, we need to give our new
life-form a name! Um, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Our target is a failed experiment officially
designated as 'Rogue Species 303.'
We in Green Division must find some way
to respond to the danger this swarm poses.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_070.text:
If this is a problem for everybody on
Delta Base, shouldn't you go get help
from the other divisions?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_080.text:
She's right! I mean, Red Division DOES
pride itself on handling odd life-forms.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_090.text:
*sigh* I suppose Green Division cannot
permit our pride to get in the way of
our greater responsibility. We must confer with Red Division.
Are you up to the task, Mags?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_100.text: Yeah, um, I don't... I mean, I'm not... No? Er, that is to say, I'm not entirely sure I'd be capable of having a productive conversation with Red Division, considering how, you know... scary they are? I mean, they're basically the war division of Delta Base, sooo...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_110.text:
I'll go with her. I've worked with Red Division,
and I understand enough about what happened
here to fill them in. I'm sure that'll give Mags
the confidence boost she needs! ...Right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_120.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_120.text: Very well, alien. Good luck. And as for you, Mags, I expect you to make yourself extremely useful. In the meantime, I will remain here and continue to monitor Rogue Species 303. Dismissed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_000.text:
We have been briefed by Red Division's
overseer. We know Delta Base is in
trouble due to Rogue Species 303.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_010.text:
Um, well, I guess our fusion of a new life-form
miiight have caused some unexpected genes to
manifest? Ones that draw quite strongly from
the honeybee side of its genetic composition?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_020.text:
Isn't there some way to wipe 'em all out?
I mean, they're basically bugs, right?
So let's go blast 'em with bug spray!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_030.text:
Unfortunately, we don't know how a rogue
species might react to insecticide. If we
inadvertently made them stronger, they could
easily end up being completely unmanageable.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_040.text:
Back in the day, I'd just hit the lot with an
area-effect spell—but without my magical
power, I have to fight 'em one at a time.
Ugh. What a drag.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_050.text:
A life-form of this type will have a queen.
Kill this queen. This will stop them.
Their proliferation will cease, halting
any further infiltration of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_060.text:
Yeah, but the thing is, we've yet to...
observe a queen? Or anything like one? I mean, it's also possible our security
cameras are just too far away for us
to make that kind of distinction!
That could be it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_070.text:
Well, I'm not about to charge right
into their hive and let 'em sting me
full of holes!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_080.text:
You need pheromones. Apply them to yourself.
This will cause the lifeforms to accept you
as an ally.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_090.text:
Good idea! We used formulation 507
for the culture solution, so we should
be able to make a pheromone out of the
monster specimens we derived it from.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_000.text:
I have applied the pheromones.
Rogue Species 303 will now
consider you an ally.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_010.text:
I thought pheromones were supposed to
smell good—this smells like somebody
horfed in a trash can and buried it
beneath an abandoned milk factory!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, you're not smelling the pheromone!
You're actually smelling the bodily fluids 
of the monster specimen it was derived from. Er, which is its urine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_030.text: I'm sorry, you smeared what all over me?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_040.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_040.text:
Red Division hopes you succeed.
If you do not, we have a failsafe.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_050.text:
If we DO botch this, our standing in
Delta Base would plummet! And since
I'm the one who caused all this trouble,
I'd have no choice but to resign.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_060.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_060.text:
Why do you do this, alien?
This is not your burden.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_070.text:
Yeah, I know. But I'm the type of girl
who always tries to finish what she
started—and I like that about me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_080.text:
I sympathize with your fate, alien.
Good luck. Return victorious.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_010.text:
The pheromone is tricking
their sensory organs!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_020.text:
They think I'm one of them!
Oh, this is SO cool!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_040.text:
Huh. I guess there's no
queen around here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_010.text:
This pheromone thing's
really doing the trick!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_020.text: So where's your— Er, I mean, where's our queen, comrade?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_010.text:
Huh? Something's not right this time...
Wait, what happened to the terrible smell?
Oh, yay! It's gone!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_040.text:
Whoopsie! They have me surrounded,
and they're NOT messing around!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_000.text:
That should be all of them, but I guess
the queen wasn't here after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_010.text:
Hang on... Is that the
sound of beating wings?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_020.text:
It's the queen! She must have received
a signal that we killed her underlings!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_000.text:
Well, we killed the queen and all
of her little worker whatevers,
so this should finally be over.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_010.text:
Thank you for your assistance, alien.
It is much appreciated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_020.text:
And what have you learned of
Rogue Species 303, Mags?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, tons! And I also documented
everything, of course.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_040.text:
Then perhaps we can consider this
experiment a stepping stone rather
than a failure.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_050.text:
See, there you go! I'm sure
you'll nail it next time!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_070.text:
Another one? Man, these things
just do NOT give up!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_080.text: Apologies. It is me. Shi Kat.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_090.text:
What!? Don't fly at me like that, man!
You have no idea how close you came
to getting bug-zapped just now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_100.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_100.text:
I have a message, Madam Overseer.
The other division overseers await
your report on this incident.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_110.text:
Understood. Then I guess this
is farewell for now, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_120.text:
This whole thing was my fault.
I'm so, so, so, SOOO sorry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_130.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_130.text:
It isn't like you to be
so apologetic, Mags.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_140.text:
Oh, you noticed that too, alien?
Yeah, my boss sorta...ordered me
to apologize to you? But now that everything worked out,
I don't regret a thing. Plus, I'm sure
all the excitement has made your visit
to Delta Base really fun!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_150.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_150.text:
Yeah, I actually had a lot of fun,
but there's still something I need
to do before I get outta here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_160.text:
You were looking for a cat, right?
Well, there's all sorts of stuff down
in the lower level, so I bet you'll
find it there. Oh, and good luck!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_170.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_170.text:
You aren't going to help me!?
YOU TRAITOR!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_000.text:
I understand you've had to endure much
due to Mags's procedural and general
incompetence, alien, and I apologize.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_010.text:
Eh, a little drama only makes life
on Delta Base all the more exciting,
if you ask me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_020.text:
And speaking of life on Delta Base,
you'd be welcome in Green Division
should you choose to remain here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_030.text:
But on another topic, while we were dealing
with this latest incident, we learned there
is an individual confined on the lower level—
one that might even be an alien like yourself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_040.text:
If that's a hint that I'm about to end
up sharing a cell, then I'm gonna blow
this lemonade stand right now. Or is this all part of some OTHER
scheme you have planned for me?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_050.text:
For Green Division's part, we have only
gratitude for your work here and wouldn't
dream of apprehending you. But I can't speak to the plans of
the other divisions, so it would
behoove you to show caution.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_060.text:
Regardless, I will make arrangements
for you to meet this other alien.
Whether or not you do so is up to you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Don't call me that, jerk! I have a name,
and it happens to be SUPER cute!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, hell! Sorry about that—didn't mean
to offend. In fact, I've actually been
waiting for you to show up! So this is the research area of Red Division.
I'm the division overseer, and this is my
data-management specialist, Shi Kat.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Okay, fine. Now why were
you waiting for me?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Relax, alien! We'll get to that. Right then! So Red Division is currently
engaged in the collection of life-form data
from numerous worlds. Dangerous life-forms
in particular. Monsters, essentially.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_050.text: See, the examiners and researchers of Delta Base have been dispatched to all sorts of worlds filled with all kinds of nasty, toothy monsters. It's Red Division's job to gather data about said monsters and come up with countermeasures—and let me tell you, there is a ton of data to wrangle.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I am Shi Kat. The data-wrangler.
The pitiless overseer is constantly
increasing my workload. I cannot begin
to estimate when I might be finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Ha ha ha! C'mon now, Kat! Let's not go
airing our dirty laundry to the alien! Now where was I...? Oh, right! Data. Yeah,
so once you understand a monster's nature,
you'll know whether fight or flight is the
best choice, and also how best to go about it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Unknown monsters. Fiends. Phantoms.
These do we analyze. These do we classify.
There is science in turning knowledge
into usable data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_090.text:
We're well aware, thank you! *sigh*
Sorry about that, alien. My colleague
here tends to be a bit thickheaded.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Super interesting there, guys,
but can we get back to the part
where you're waiting for me?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh, right! That! Okay, so when you
showed up here, it actually triggered
a momentary power failure that wiped out
vital portions of our monster-data library.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Are you trying to say I'M
responsible for that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_130.text: Ha ha ha! You sure are!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Anyway, since this is all your fault,
we need you to go to the lower level
and track down the biochip that has
our backup monster data on it. All we know is that it's inside a container,
but just open 'em all and I'm sure you'll
eventually run across it. Good? Good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_150.text:
We can restore the erased
data with that biochip.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_160.text:
I'll give you permission to take the lift
to the lower level. Oh, but be careful down
there! The electromagnetic gates have sorta
been on the fritz lately.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Aw, it's just a gate that delivers a
massively painful and dangerous electrical
shock whenever something touches it. We built the thing in case any of our
nastier research specimens ever got out.
Can't be too careful, am I right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_190.text:
I suppose that's also
somehow my fault?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Ha ha ha! It sure is! I mean, probably.
Anyway, safety first and all that, right?
Now good luck down there!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh hey, the biochip! Nice going!
Now we can restore that missing data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
You're just as good as I'd hoped, alien.
I knew you could do it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Well if you say the problem was my fault,
I have a responsibility to help solve it.
Not that I was ever aware it happened...
Anyway, byeee!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Ha ha ha! Man, what a sap. Now let's see
what details of the alien's physiology 
were collected by the biochip.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_050.text:
It would seem she's far more
compatible than anticipated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Ho there, alien! Boy, you really have
a knack for showing up exactly when
I want you to. I love it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_01.text:
What do you want me from NOW!?
I haven't done anything wrong!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Ha ha! Well, I'm sure you didn't MEAN to,
but when we reviewed our newest data,
we learned some information regarding
Monster Specimen 056 was lost. It's all terribly unfortunate.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 056.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only one who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 056.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 056
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_05.text:
I cannot fight the beast. I would be slain
before any useful data could be collected.
Please go in my place, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_06.text: Yeah, you do look pretty weak and spindly. So sure, I'm in.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Ha ha! Wonderful! You've met my
expectations once again, alien. Anyway, we'll handle all the data collection
and numbers and all that nerd stuff, so you
just worry about the fighting. Good? Good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 056 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_10.text:
There are various goals we pursue.
Isolating beneficial characteristics.
Engaging in potential domestication.
So forth and so on.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Yes, yes, it's all simply fascinating.
Now enough with the idle chitchat!
Let's get on with the fighting!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_12.text:
Easy for you to say when I'm
the one throwing down.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_13.text:
I know, right? Sadly, overseers aren't allowed
to fight. Too valuable, too hard to replace—
you know how it is right? Right. Sure you do.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_00.text:
So this is where you have
Specimen 056 penned up?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are! Now get in there and smack
the thing in the face a few times so we
can finally complete our database, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_02.text:
C'mon, alien! Let's see some enthusiasm!
Hup, hup! Hoo-rah! Get 'er done!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_04.text:
Do please be careful, alien.
For both our sakes.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, alien! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 056!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_01.text:
Now get the data restored
already, Kat! Hop to it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_03.text:
...For all her supposed suitability, she'd be
useless to us if she couldn't survive a battle
of that intensity—so I'm VERY glad to see
she passed the test! Ha ha ha!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_04.text:
Still, the other divisions don't seem to know
what we're attempting here—or maybe they do
and are just granting consent through silence? Eh, whatever. She's my alien now,
and I'll utilize her as I see fit!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_06.text: Um, you didn't give me my reward.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_07.text:
DIDN'T I? Well, that was dumb.
Probably Kat's fault, honestly,
because you certainly deserve one!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_08.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_08.text:
Okay, what was with that creepy soliloquy?
I'm starting to think that overseer doesn't
have my best interests at heart. He's using me for something—and not just me,
but probably all of Red Division and maybe
even Delta Base!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_09.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_09.text:
