Yup! I need to find my cat and
get the heck outta here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Ha ha! Well, I'm sure you didn't MEAN to,
but when we reviewed our newest data,
we learned some information regarding
Monster Specimen 098 was lost. It's all terribly unfortunate.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 098.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only one who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 098.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 098
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 098 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_00.text:
So this is where you have
Specimen 098 penned up?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are—and we REALLY need
you to fight it so we can get our
first-encounter data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_02.text:
I mean, you know how it is when there's a
gap in consecutively numbered files, right?
Drives you crazy!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Yeah, well, apologies in advance if I
drop this guy so quick that you don't
get anything useful.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, alien! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 098!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Ha ha! Well, I'm sure you didn't MEAN to,
but when we reviewed our newest data,
we learned some information regarding
Monster Specimen 507 was lost. It's all terribly unfortunate.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 507.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only one who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 507.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 507
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 507 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_00.text:
So this is where you have
Specimen 507 penned up?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are! Now get in there and smack
the thing in the face a few times so we
can finally complete our database, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_02.text:
Hey, so that's 507, right?
How many different monster specimens
do you guys even have?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Our numbering system is not indicative
of the total. Specimens are destroyed.
New varieties are discovered—including
cursed and artificially developed ones. I estimate there are roughly 75,000 in all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_04.text:
But if you have that many, why is everyone
getting their undies bunched because
of one missing data point?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Because only through the accumulation of
data are fundamental truths revealed! Sooo... The fighting? C'mon, let's go.
Very busy man over here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_07.text:
Ha ha! Oh, this has been fun!
...But seriously. Let's go.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, alien! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 507!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Ho there, alien! Boy, am I ever in awe of
your knack for appearing at the right place
and at the right time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Seriously? You need MORE of
your stupid data recovered!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Not exactly. See, while we were attempting
to update our combat data on a particular
specimen, we experienced an unexpected
infestation of parasitic slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_04.text:
The slime mold is consuming all of our
monster specimens AND multiplying
at an almost unbelievable rate.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Thing is, most of Red Division has been sent
offworld on official business, and we don't
have the strength to fight it. And yeah, sure, we could ask the
other divisions for help, but yuck!
Who wants to do that? Not me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_06.text:
If this is a crisis, why hold back?
Any port in a storm and all that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Noted. But in this case, the port
I have chosen is YOU, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I'm currently working up an analysis of the
slime mold's properties that I should have
finished up here shortly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_09.text:
So you're going to help us, right?
Sure you are!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, alien? How about it?
Will you help us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_01.text:
We have come to understand a few
aspects of the slime mold's nature.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_02.text:
We can obstruct its movements
with our electromagnetic gates.
These gates have been activated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_03.text:
You can deactivate individual gates
by using switches near containers.
However, they cannot be reactivated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_04.text:
Okay, so our sensors picked up three swarms
of slimes. Or packs. Or, uh, whatever slimes
travel around in. Herds, maybe? Oh, and when this is all over,
there's a reward waiting for you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_05.text: I've got a feeling a reward isn't all that's waiting for me...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_07.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_07.text:
Nothing! Just super-duper excited
to take care of your mold problem.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_08.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_08.text:
I wonder if I can really
trust these people...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, this is just strange...
We've never seen this particular
variety of slime mold before!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_030_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_030_CUT_000_01.text: This should be the last of 'em!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierZ
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_00.text:
This slime mold looks like your everyday
garden-variety stuff, but it's actually
some sort of new species or subspecies.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_01.text:
A discovery of this nature must be
reported to the other divisions.
This is correct, yes?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, Kat! You and your rules! Look, involving the other divisions
is only going to complicate things.
Bureaucracy, paperwork, infighting...
Blech, am I right!? I'll just handle it myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_03.text:
This could affect all of Delta Base.
Why are you hiding it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_04.text:
Look, outsider. There are all sorts of inter-
divisional tensions that you just don't get.
If I let them know about this, they'll see
us as weak—and I'm NOT letting that happen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_05.text:
First I'm 'alien,' and now 'outsider'?
Ameya is such a perfectly cute name...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_00.text:
We believe the slime mold has emerged from
the containment unit of Specimen 440,
Mr. Overseer, sir!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_01.text:
Specimen 440... Yes, of course.
Exactly as I suspected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_02.text:
The containment unit has been destroyed from
the inside, sir, and the slime mold seems to have
been feeding off of the specimen it contained.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_03.text:
We must report this at once.
Yellow Division must know.
Green Division must know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_04.text:
Slow down there, speedy!
We'll hold off on that report until we've
had time to conduct a full investigation.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_05.text:
So you DO know more than you're letting on!
What's the significance of Specimen 440,
and why did you drag me into this!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, I suppose you've earned
a few answers, my alien friend. Right as you arrived here, Specimen 440
woke up. But just as we were getting
ready to analyze its combat potential,
the slime mold infestation began.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_07.text:
We naturally suspected that your arrival
was connected to Specimen 440, but needed
actual evidence this was the case. And guess what? We were right!
The two are most definitely related.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_08.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_08.text:
Okay, I get that you think my coming here
caused this to happen, but you also said
my coming here caused a power failure!
So couldn't THAT be the cause?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_09.text:
Yes, that seems plausible. We were observing
whether or not the slime mold would react
to your presence, but so far we've seen
zero evidence of that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_10.text:
Anyway, that's why we're going to need your
continued participation for just a teensy
bit longer! You're good with that, right?
Sure you are.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_11.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_11.text:
Well, I'd rather deal with this slime now
than risk being blindsided by it at some
point in the future, so sure. Count me in.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierX
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_00.text:
Sir, none of the characteristics of this
infestation match the data of known slime
molds in our database. I feel it would be
best to inform the other divisions.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_01.text:
I understand, soldier—well,
in the sense I acknowledge that
as your personal point of view.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_02.text:
Uh, thank you, sir? So should I issue
an official interdivisional report?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_05.text:
440 is a unique specimen,
and I'm not going to let the other
divisions start meddling with it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_06.text:
Why, if the specimen was destroyed,
all of my amazing plans for it
would amount to nothing!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_07.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_07.text:
And do these 'amazing plans'
involve me somehow?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_08.text:
These plans, alien, are something I hatched
before I even became overseer. They have
nothing to do with your appearance.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_00.text:
The slime mold scurried back
to the containment thingy!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_01.text:
I've confirmed the presence of Specimen 440.
Looks like that damn slime mold destroyed
the containment unit from the inside and
consumed all of its bodily tissue!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_02.text:
So this thing is full
of slime mold? Ew.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_03.text:
This unit contains a mummified human male.
The slime mold seems to be functioning as
tentacular appendages that are providing
nutrition to the mummy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_04.text:
Wait, so a dead mummy has come to life and
and is now using slime mold to bring it food?
I mean, that's a zombie, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_05.text:
Mmm, not quite. See, the slime mold activity was
a clear sign the mummy was preparing to rise
from its slumber—we just didn't expect it to
happen so quickly! Ugh. What a pain.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_06.text:
You don't seem all that bothered to me.
You sure this isn't all part of one of your
secret plans?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_07.text:
I wish! But no, totally unrelated.
We need to bring that slime mold under
control, which means we have to fight
the thing again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_08.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_08.text:
Wow, you really have no idea
how to inspire people.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_00.text:
Okay! The slime mold has been brought
under control, which means we can
finally resume the experiment.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_01.text:
Ooh, let me guess: 'And now our data
needs updating. Ha ha ha! Go kill this
list of creatures for me, alien!'

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, I DO so appreciate how much
of my time you save with your
quick grasp of these situations! You are indeed correct, alien. However, I can
tell by your sarcasm that you may be tiring
of this, so let me just say that if you refuse,
I'll have to make Shi Kat do it instead.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_04.text:
Oh, I know I wouldn't get the results
I wanted when poor Shi Kat was inevitably
turned into a pulsating pile of goo—but
I bet I'd end up with SOMETHING!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_05.text:
Okay, you aren't just a weirdo—
you're legitimately awful.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_06.text:
I'm going to take that as a yes.
Now come on, alien! Hop to it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
As always, alien, I'm grateful for your
cooperation. Let's start the experiment!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
This could lead to another slime mold
infestation. We should enlist the
assistance of Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Mr. Kat, did I just hear you volunteer to help
us gather combat data in the alien's stead?
I mean, you ARE a member of Red Division,
so that would be the more preferable outcome.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_03.text:
No, Overseer. I said nothing.
Good luck to you, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Right then! Let me start by explaining the
properties of the slime mold. Basically,
they function as a colony with the ability to
mimic the appearance and behaviors of a host.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Wait a minute, how do you
suddenly know all this stuff?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_06.text:
I know it because I was the one
who discovered this species! See, the objective of this experiment isn't just
to gather combat data: it's a second attempt at
an experiment I conducted over 3,000 cycles ago—
one thought to have ended in failure!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_07.text:
The goal of that experiment was to acquire
stronger bodies by using parasitic slime
molds that could consume, fuse with,
and gain the powers of their hosts. We theorized that a host possessed of a
powerful will might be able to gain the
slime's powers while still retaining their
own autonomy after being consumed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_08.text:
But the experiment ended in failure,
and the test specimen was sealed away
inside this capsule. He is known as the Beast King—number 440.
We'd worked together as researchers countless
times, and he was the only member of Red Division
I ever considered to be a partner.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_09.text:
Okay, I'm legitimately sorry you lost
your partner in a failed experiment,
but what does that have to do with
this one here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_10.text:
It has EVERYTHING to do with
this experiment, alien! You're strong—so strong, in fact, that when
the slime mold attempts to take control of you,
you may be powerful enough to resist it and
gain its ability for yourself! Also, if you end up being taken over by the
slime, the Beast King will be free of its control
and come back to life. See? Win-win!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Okay, hang on. You dragged me into
this mess because you think your
mummy friend is still ALIVE?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_12.text:
Specimen 440 is a colony of slime mold.
It is not the Beast King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_13.text:
Silence, insect! What do you know of the
Beast King and slime mold!? Nothing! Oh, but don't worry, alien! Should you
end up being consumed by the slime mold,
you'll just live on in a mummified form!
Pretty neat, right? SO neat!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_14.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_14.text:
You must escape at once, alien.
The overseer's behavior has
become dangerously erratic.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_15.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_15.text:
It's fine, Shi Kat. Go ahead and open the
containment unit. I want to put an end
to this ridiculous experiment—and it takes
more than a pile of goo to scare a witch!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_16.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_16.text:
Aaah ha ha ha! I LOVE it, alien!
You have such AMBITION! Now go! Do it! Fight that slime
mold and GIVE IT ALL YA GOT!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_17.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_17.text:
You are certain, alien?
Then I will do it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_18.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_18.text:
Oh, I'll do it, all right...
And there we go. Capsule open!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_19.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_19.text:
So you're either the Beast King or a pile
of slime mold in his shape. Well, one fight
should be enough to clear that up!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_20.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_20.text:
What!? No! Stop, you stupid slime!
You're supposed to attack the alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_22.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_22.text:
Specimen 440 is moving to another part
of the base. I speculate it is seeking
more suitable prey.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_23.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_23.text:
No! No, that's not it at ALL! Don't you see!? It's him! It's the Beast King!
He's looking for his beloved sword!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_01.text:
He has been arrested by decree of
our division council, and will likely
be dismissed from his duties soon.
I have been appointed acting overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_03.text:
We activated the electromagnetic gate
to keep it contained, but do not know
how long it will hold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_04.text:
A portion of the slime mold managed to slip
through the gate before it was activated.
We do not know its present location.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_05.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_05.text:
The overseer—er, the former overseer,
I guess—said it was looking for its
'beloved sword.' What's that mean?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_06.text:
That sword is an artifact. 
Yellow Division is in charge of artifacts.
We should contact them about this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_00.text:
The electronic gate to the monster pens
has been broken. This is likely due to
the slime mold. I believe it is seeking
further prey to consume.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_01.text:
If we do not address this situation,
the monsters will be absorbed by the
Beast King. This will make him very
powerful. We will not be able to fight him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_02.text:
Then we should take out the other
monsters before it can. Kind of sad,
though—even they don't deserve that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_03.text:
We should collaborate with Green Division.
They can gas the area. This will put the
monsters into a state of paralysis.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_04.text:
Oh, that sounds good! Then even
an acting overseer like you could
saunter in there and round 'em up.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_05.text:
Yes. This will prevent us from
losing any of our precious samples.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_00.text:
Please lower the gate, Mr. Acting
Overseer. I can't get to the Beast
King with it in my way.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_01.text:
Are you sure? Have you made
all the necessary preparations?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_00.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_00.text:
Whoa, crazy. I can't believe the
Beast King's causing trouble again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_02.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_02.text:
Yeah, so a while back, somebody from Red
Division stole a cursed sword from us.
We all figured the Beast King was behind it,
but he always refused to admit it. Anyway, one day he up and died,
and we ended up getting it back.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_03.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_03.text:
I mean, stealing a cursed sword and
keeping it until you die? What a loon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_04.text:
I cannot speak to his motives,
but please allow Red Division to take
custody of that sword once more. A normal artifact container will not suffice.
It must be kept safe from the slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_05.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh man, alien! You got yourself
mixed up in something weird again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_06.text:
I sure have, Bean—and I could use
your help in getting out of it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_07.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_07.text:
No worries! One cursed sword,
coming right up.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_08.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_08.text:
Thanks, Bean. Er, but why do you
keep calling it a 'cursed' sword?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_09.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_09.text:
Oh, because anyone who wields it is
cursed with horrible, never-ending pain!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, we recovered the cursed sword, but we
still don't know why the Beast King took it.
Sounds like only the former overseer is going
to be able to answer that one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_02.text:
By the way, do you think
I could use this sword?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_06.text:
Yellow Division told us the
Beast King stole it from them. Why?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_07.text:
We calculated that the power of that sword's
curse prevented the slime mold from taking over
his consciousness—and we were RIGHT!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_08.text:
The Beast King got the power of the slime mold
without being consumed by it, and it was
all thanks to that curse!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_09.text:
Sadly, the power of the curse ate away
at his mind and made him REALLY violent. Eventually we had to take the sword away,
at which point he was immediately consumed
by the slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_10.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_10.text:
I don't understand. If the Beast King weakened
the slime mold with that sword's curse, why is
the slime mold trying to get it back?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_11.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_11.text:
Because his strong will is still working
AGAINST the slime mold. He wants to
reclaim the sword—and in doing so,
reclaim his very self! Please, you have to help him!
Give him that sword! I beg you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_12.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_12.text:
But won't getting the sword back just
drive him mad again? That's no solution!
We need to figure out something that doesn't
involve a sword that makes you crazy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_13.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_13.text:
Better store this sword away somewhere
safe, Mr. Acting Overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_030_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_030_CUT_000_00.text:
You're not getting away from me
this time, Beast King!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_00.text:
You're not getting away from me
this time, Beast King!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_01.text:
Here, Beast King! It's your sword!
Take it and reclaim yourself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_02.text: What's the old overseer doing here!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_440
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_04.text: I am the Beast King...and I am REBORN!

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_MON_KATANA_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_MON_KATANA_000_000.text:
Well, that should do it
for the slime mold.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_MON_KATANA_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_MON_KATANA_000_010.text:
He managed to free himself
of the slime mold at last.

SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_MON_KATANA_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_GIMK_AMYA_MON_KATANA_000_020.text:
And now we've got to free
ourselves from the Beast King!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_00.text: I'm terribly sorry to bother you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_01.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_01.text:
Ah, it's you. I received word of your request
from my researchers. We're happy to cooperate,
but take no responsibility for what happens
to your samples as a result of the gas.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_02.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_02.text:
Hello again, alien. You seem to have quite
the habit of getting swept up in these
sorts of things, don't you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_03.text:
That's my destiny. But hey,
at least I'm never bored!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_04.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_04.text: Mags, help them prepare the gas.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_05.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_05.text: I'll take care of this, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_06.text:
MAGS!? I suddenly have serious
reservations about this plan...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_07.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_07.text:
Um, listen, Mags. Are you SURE you've
got this worked out? This gas isn't going
to make the monsters turn into bigger,
meaner monsters or something?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_08.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_08.text:
Oh, it certainly might! ...Er, sorry.
Did the overseer not make that clear?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_09.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_09.text:
Okay, the gas is ready. We can use the tank
on the lower level to disperse it throughout
the area, so let's get moving.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_00.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_00.text:
This is Green Division's gas tank.
Er, but it's primarily used for the
creation and cooling of fresh air,
and not for spreading poison.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_01.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_01.text:
The gas should have a sedative effect on the
monsters. We don't dare use anything close to
a lethal dose, because that might cause some
very big problems for the rest of the base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_02.text:
A wise decision. Our division is
composed of beings from a variety
of different species, after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_03.text:
A mistake here would
be real bad, Mags.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_04.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_04.text:
Okay, the gas I derived from the
monophid seeds is in the tank.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_05.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_05.text:
All you gotta do now
is flip the switch!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_08.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_08.text:
It...worked? It WORKED!
Mags, you beautiful genius!
You've done it again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_00.text:
No, Beast King! Don't die!
You can't leave me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_01.text:
This poor man has been kept alive
by slime mold for 3,000 cycles.
Time to let him find some peace.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_02.text:
...No! There's still a chance! I command you to eat me, slime mold!
Take your nourishment from me so
the Beast King might live again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_04.text:
It's happening! The consciousness of all
the life-forms the slime mold has ever
consumed are flowing into me! Ah! The Beast King is here too!
Oh, my friend, how I've missed you!
If only I'd known this back then!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Kat! I order you to seal us in that capsule
and number it 440A. Should a slime-removal
technique be discovered, you are to...to...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_07.text:
I owe you an apology for all we put
you through, alien. But now I must
ensure capsule 440A is properly sealed.
We will speak later.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_08.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_08.text:
So was that...a happy ending? 
'Cause it doesn't feel like one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_00.text:
As promised, alien, I apologize again for
involving you in so many irregular situations.
I assure you that the overseer and Beast King
are now safely asleep within Capsule 440A.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_01.text:
That can't be true, because I'm looking
at the Red Division overseer right now! I heard you officially got the job, Shi Kat.
Good for you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_02.text:
A being like myself? Leading Red Division?
I cannot believe it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_03.text:
I viewed my predecessor as a reckless being.
A human too chaotic to even process his own data.
But I saw what happened to him in the end,
and realize the Beast King was his true friend. I have no one like that in my life.
I have no friends. I...envy him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_04.text:
Yeah, there's something admirable about
the way he pursued his dream to the
bitter end like that—even if it WAS
a giant pain in the butt.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_05.text:
We would not have resolved this matter without
you, alien. You have set aside your own goals 
for the sake of Delta Base. We all thank you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_06.text:
Aw, shucks! That's sweet. But if you don't mind,
I want to get back to my own goals now.
Can I get your permission to keep searching
through Delta Base?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_07.text:
Take all the time you need.
I wish you luck.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 056, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_01.text:
Data for this monster already exists.
There is no need to fight it.
I would advise against it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_02.text: So this isn't the right monster?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_03.text: But I wanna fight it anyway!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 098, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_01.text:
Data for this monster already exists.
There is no need to fight it.
I would advise against it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_02.text: So this isn't the right monster?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_03.text: But I wanna fight it anyway!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 507, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_01.text:
Data for this monster already exists.
There is no need to fight it.
I would advise against it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_02.text: So this isn't the right monster?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_03.text: But I wanna fight it anyway!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, hey! Welcome to Yellow Division, 
where we conduct research on the 
civilizations of various worlds. So you're an alien, right? Cool, cool.
The subjects of our research don't
usually come to us—or at least that's
what the division overseer told me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
So are all the members of
Yellow Division mechs?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, if only! I'm Unit B888888, dispatched
from Administration to take over the
overseer's managerial duties. I'm actually the only robot assigned to
Yellow Division. Oh, and everybody here
calls me 'Bean.' Hilarious, right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
The Yellow Division overseer has been in
pretty poor health lately, so he's resting
up at the medical facility. But the work doesn't care when a guy's sick,
and it just keeps pilin' up! That's why they
sent me here to help out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Which reminds me, I was supposed to
do something... Oh, right! Promptly
deliver the alien to the overseer.
Guess we better get on that. C'mon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Wow, this guy's a lot
pushier than he looks!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_000.text:
Greetings, alien. I am pleased you've come
to visit us, and would like to ask you
many questions about your home world.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_010.text:
Are you the Yellow Division overseer?
I'd heard you were feeling sick.
Are you better now?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_020.text:
It appears you hail from a world rich in 
compassion—or so I gather from the fact
you are inquiring about the health of
a complete stranger. But let us start over, as in my
excitement I have quite shamefully
failed to introduce myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_030.text:
I am indeed the Yellow Division overseer,
and my health is indeed rapidly worsening.
In truth, I do not know how much time I have. But perhaps my luck is turning, for here,
in my moment of deepest despair, you have
appeared—and through you, I will gain
all manner of new knowledge!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_040.text:
You want to hear about my world? Yeah, sure!
Okay, so I'm from a place called Pulchra,
which is where witches live. Now I'm still
technically an apprentice witch, but I—

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_050.text:
A moment, please. I haven't the strength
to absorb all you have to say. Bean, have you made preparations to
conduct a full research interview?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_060.text:
Yeah, about that. The research scientists
are still down in the lower-level archives,
so I couldn't put a plan together. Those guys! They probably got their noses
caught in some dusty old tome and lost all
track of time! Ha ha ha!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_070.text:
Man, I know what that's like! You're busy
with something, but then a book catches your
eye and oops! There goes the entire day! Anyway, I could go grab 'em if you want.
I'd love a chance to see your library!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_080.text:
You have my gratitude once more, alien,
and I find my interest in your world
deepening rapidly. Bean, would you be so kind as to
help the alien find the researchers?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_000.text:
I didn't want to worry the overseer,
but the researchers are actually studying
ancient cursed tomes. So, uh, they've
probably been cursed, is my guess.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_010.text:
So they didn't come back because they
COULDN'T? Oh, that's horrible! We need
to get down there and save them!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_020.text:
Splendid! I'll activate the lift and we
can go down together. Thanks for all
your help here, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_000.text:
I opened this ancient text purely out
of curiosity and was promptly cursed.
Now I can't move and everything hurts.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_010.text: The fiend that was sealed within the volume wishes to use my body in order to manifest itself in reality. And while that's likely going to be terribly unpleasant in the end, I am appreciating the opportunity to experience a curse firsthand!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Whoa! A fiend sealed in a tome is
manifesting itself through a curse?
We have to document this!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Um, shouldn't we be
saving his life?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_050.text:
Thank you very much. Now if you'll excuse me,
I need to go and document what happened back
at the division office.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Yikes, man. Is everyone in
Yellow Division like that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_080.text: So the curse can also be lifted by slaying the associated fiend? I must document this! ...Urgh. Oh dear. While I'm happy the curse is lifted, I'm somehow in even more pain now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_090.text: But at least the curse is gone!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_100.text: He has no one to blame but himself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_000.text:
When I started reading this ancient tome,
it unleashed some manner of horrible curse.
Now I can't move. Ugh.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Now THIS is interesting! It appears to be a
DNA conversion script that turns its reader
into a fiend! I've gotta try that sometime...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_030.text:
I can't believe there are still curses
in a world that's so modern and tech-y.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_040.text: There are curses that function through mechanical engineering, you know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_070.text:
This is some extremely valuable curse
data! Time to download it to the ol'
memory banks...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_080.text:
It appears that by slaying the monster,
the DNA conversion reverses itself.
What an advanced curse!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_100.text:
The conversion script has disappeared!
Fight it again, please!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_000.text:
When we read the tome, our backs froze up
and we couldn't move. I surmise that we
have all been cursed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Guys, come on! You were sent here in a group
of three specifically so you could watch each
other and make sure no one looked at, read,
or opened anything!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Sorry, but...you know. Researchers?
Our curiosity got the better of us.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_030.text: Ah, the allure of the forbidden.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Dear me. When curiosity overcomes
reason, things go terribly wrong.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_060.text:
All of you need to learn to
take curses more seriously.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_070.text:
Honestly, I didn't expect the curses
to take effect so quickly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_080.text:
We never should have
read those books.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_090.text:
Consider yourself lucky that slaying
those fiends lifted the curses!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_000.text:
Now that all of our researchers are safe,
it's time for me to head back and prepare
your qualitative research interview.
Thanks for your patience, friend!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, right! The interview thingie!
I completely forgot about that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_020.text:
How odd to encounter cursed tomes in
a world of science! How is it that trouble
finds me no matter where I happen to be?
Being popular sure has its downsides.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_000.text:
Will you attempt to dispel
the curse for us, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_010.speaker: HERO
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_010.text: Sure, I'll give it a shot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_000.text:
I'm ready for my interview
whenever you are!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, about that. When I reported the cursed
tomes incident to the overseer, he ordered me
to continue researching them, seeing as I'm
immune to curses and all. Anyway, looks like your interview is
gonna have to wait.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
You're immune to curses? Why, because
you're a robot? Yeah, I don't know if I'd
be so confident in that assumption.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Okay, why would you even say that!?
Are you TRYING to scare me here?
Of course I'm immune! ...Right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Just trying to keep you on your toes! 
Besides, even if you DID get cursed,
I'm sure you'd be fine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Ugh. UGH. Now I'm just a nervous wreck about
this whole thing. But I can't say 'no' to an
overseer on his deathbed, sooo...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_060.text:
Well, I'm happy to help
with whatever you need.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_000.text: Hmm? Got something in my pocket.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_010.text:
It's a page torn from a book!
When did I pick this up?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_020.text:
Feels like this could be important.
I mean, REALLY important.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Heavens, lady! That looks like a page
from the mysterious tome known as
the Necronomicon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, I picked it up somewhere.
Is it important?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Yes, that's a Necronomicon page, all right.
This is highly auspicious: that book is said
to tear out its own pages and grant good
fortune to whoever returns them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Might I have that page?
I'm DYING to test that theory!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_050.text:
No way, man! I found it,
so the luck is all mine!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Tsk! Should have just kept my mouth shut.
But if the Necronomicon flays your flesh
from your bones, don't come crying to me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Okay, let's pop this page
back in the book.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_010.text: Boy, this book is a real mess.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_020_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, where's my good luck?
I got totally scammed!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_021_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_021_CUT_000_000.text:
Yeah, I don't feel good
about any of this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_021_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_04_021_CUT_000_010.text: I'm just gonna toss the page.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This looks like some kind
of research center.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It sure is! How was an alien like
yourself able to discern that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yesss! Nailed it in one!
Also, just intuition, I guess?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Intuition: The ability to instantly grasp
a thing without conscious reasoning. How fascinating! That is one of the primary
drivers of animal behavior. Similar terms
include instinct, 'gut' feelings, and having
a 'sixth sense.'

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Wow, you sure do know
lots of stuff!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Not at all! I am Advanced Office-Work Model
B888888, dispatched by the Administrative
Division to handle the organizational duties
of Yellow Division's current overseer. Oh, and everybody here calls me 'Bean.'
Hilarious, right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_060.text:
So here's the thing, alien: I've been ordered
to bring you to the overseer the moment you
arrive, but...I don't really want to.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Can a robot just ignore
orders like that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Not really, no! And since I have to prioritize
orders without regard for my own feelings,
I suppose we're off to see the overseer. But before we go, let me fill you
in on a little something first:

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Due to a recent illness, the overseer
has become excessively paranoid. And between you and me, I bet he's
going to think you've come here to
reclaim the cultural artifacts taken
from your world by Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_100.text:
I'm here looking for a cat, Bean—I couldn't
care less about your cultural-artifact
collection or whatever.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_110.text:
That's great! But I'm also hurt to hear you
'couldn't care less' about cultural artifacts.
Please do be more careful about how you frame
such things in the overseer's presence, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_000.text:
There you are, alien!
From which world do you hail?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_020.text:
Pulchra, is it? So you've come to reclaim
the fabled sword Graywand—a relic even
Pulchra's witches were not able to claim
from the Castle of Mist! Without Yellow Division's knowledge and
technology, it would remain lost to all!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_030.text:
Liar! If this Graywand thing was such a big deal,
the Arch Witch would never allow it to be taken
from Pulchra—not to mention my mom and all of
the other witches. Also, Pulchra is no easy place to get into.
I'm starting to wonder if your division has
ever really been there at all!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_040.text:
I see the rumors about the pride of the
witches of Pulchra were not exaggerated! Well, argue all you want, but the fact remains
that Graywand is in the possession of Yellow
Division—and once you lay eyes upon it,
even you will not be able to deny it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_050.text:
Bean, you will permit this alien to
view the sword—under the strictest
of supervision, of course.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_000.text:
I apologize for the overseer's behavior.
He's been nothing but ill-tempered lately,
much to the sorrow of everyone in
Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_010.text:
Anyway, I need to make a follow-up report
to the overseer, so please go view the sword
in question—whether you want to or not.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_020.text: I've never heard of any sword called 'Graywand,' but the mention of it sent a chill down my spine. So while I don't want to see it, I will. I feel like it's my duty somehow.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_030.text:
Neat! So let's go do that before you
change your mind. I'll activate the lift
to the lower level here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Wait, THIS is Graywand?
Why is it in pieces!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I assure you that this is not our doing;
the sword was originally created to separate
in this fashion, and for now it must remain
in this disassembled state.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_020.text:
He's right! The moment you appeared here,
alien, this sword started to vibrate.
These vibrations triggered a dimensional
resonance that caused energy forms to appear.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_030.text:
By which Bean means monsters. Yet by separating
the sword's pieces, we can lessen its resonance
and weaken the energy forms it spawns—making
the monsters smaller, in other words. And that's why we're keeping the thing in
pieces while we investigate the source.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_040.text:
The Yellow Division overseer seemed to
think I had some connection to the sword.
Pains me to see it like this, but I think
breaking it up was the right choice.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_050.text:
When disassembled, a pattern resembling words
appears on the surface of the blade. We believe
this has some sort of supernatural or ceremonial
significance, but that's still being investigated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_060.text:
...Oh dear. It seems an energy form has
found us. Bean, could you do something?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_070.text:
Those monsters may hold some clue to the
sword's background. Let's take 'em down!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_000.text:
It's kinda hard to imagine how this sword
fits together just by looking at the pieces.
Do you know what it used to look like?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_010.text: Sadly, that's not exactly an easy thing to describe. Based solely on its appearance, one would hardly surmise it was a weapon at all. However, one could definitely sense a sort of power contained within it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_020.text: Was it rusty or nicked or anything?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_030.text: Oh, nothing of the sort! See, the technology here in Delta Base let us restore it to a flawless state. Er, although we did lose possession of it for a bit after that...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_040.text:
But we haven't performed any sort of in-depth
study since it was returned to us. Honestly,
the only reason we're even looking at the
thing now is because you showed up.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_050.text:
You don't know this is my fault!
Do your job and research what happened!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_060.text:
Fair point! It's entirely possible this
is unrelated to your being here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Say, uh, Bean? I think we're about to
have another energy form on our hands.
Can you take care of it, please?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_000.text:
Have you been able to
decipher the inscription?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_010.text:
It clearly indicates that something will happen
when the sword is reassembled, but the risk of
doing so is too great until we find a way to
stop the vibration.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Do you have any leads?
Like, any at all?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_030.text:
We're attempting to negate the vibration by
reversing the characters of the inscription,
but we haven't been able to focus on the task
with all the energy forms running about.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, no worries!
We can handle that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_050.text:
You're not handling anything, Bean!
I'm doing it all!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_000.text:
It appears that if we create a replica with
the inscription reversed, it will conversely
absorb the vibrations—which will let us safely
continue our research on the upper level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_010.text:
I will let you handle
the rest, Bean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_000.text:
When the energy forms disappear, their energy
flows back into the sword—which means the
sword itself may be a kind of generator. We need to study it further once
we have the other pieces.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_010.text:
Can you take care of that
for us, please?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_000.text:
So this sword isn't actually a weapon.
While it may have been used as one,
that was never its intended function. But as to what its proper function
actually is, we don't yet know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_010.text:
Regardless, this sounds like a fruitful
avenue of study, don't you think?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_030.text:
These pieces should allow us to reassemble
the sword. We can then show it to the alien
in accordance with the overseer's orders.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_060.text:
I appreciate your patience, alien!
Don't worry, we'll have this thing
patched back together in no time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_070.text:
Aw, don't be like that! Just take a
look once it's put back together.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_000.text:
We finished restoring the sword, alien!
Come take a look!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, I'm sure you of all people remember
what it's supposed to look like, right? That's why I'm taking you to the artifact-
restoration workshop so you can experience
the restoration duties of a Yellow Division
member firsthand!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_030.text: Not exactly a thrill ride, but sure.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_040.text: Let the dumb thing stay broken!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_050.text:
Splendid work! And with this, I can officially
say that I've followed the overseer's order
to show you the sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, and there's MORE good news! The repair of
the sword seems to have made the overseer feel
better; he intends to return to work and
study the sword's true purpose personally!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_070.text:
How great that he's feeling well
enough to return to work!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_080.text:
Hey, so you also seem to have something of an
interest in the sword's true nature, right?
If so, you should join us in our research!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_090.text:
Well, if the mood strikes me,
I suppose I might.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_110.text:
There was a leftover piece from the sword!
But it all fit back together perfectly,
so how is this possible?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_120.text: Hoo boy. This doesn't bode well.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_130.text:
Ack! No! I don't know if I'll be able
to put it back together again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hello there! So what goes on in
this part of the base, huh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_010.text:
...Hmm? Can't hear you, friend.
I SAID, hello there!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Knock knock! Anybody home?
Snore twice if you're sleeping.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Aw, it must be broken. That's a bummer.
Maybe I can magic it back to some
semblance of functionality...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Fully functional, thank you! However, I have been ordered to ignore the
alien—which is you—and would appreciate you
not interfering with that, especially since
you are FAR more assertive than I expected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_050.text:
You were ORDERED to ignore me? Rude!
Who told you to do that!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The Yellow Division overseer ordered the
entire division not to engage with the alien—
and as his administrative surrogate, I had
no choice but to follow said order. Oh, and please don't ask me why he issued that
order, because I have ZERO idea. Frankly, I feel
like chatting with you is a wonderful opportunity
for cultural exchange!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Can't say it feels good to be completely
ignored without any explanation as to why.
Where is this overseer of yours?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_080.text: Oh, I'm afraid the overseer has been in poor health for quite some time and is currently being treated in the medical facility. And while visitors aren't expressly forbidden, it won't be easy to get in.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Medical facility, got it.
I'll head straight over.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Ack! I didn't expect she'd pursue
him right into the hospital!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Hi there, hey. So I heard I could find
the Yellow Division overseer in here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_120.text:
The Yellow Division overseer is I, alien!
Now why have you come!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Because you ordered your whole division
to ignore me, and I wanna know why! Also keep in mind that if I don't like
your reason, I reserve the right
to respond VERY poorly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Your visit here has put the entirety of 
Delta Base in danger, alien—which is why
I want you to complete your objective and
leave as quickly as possible. And as far as Yellow Division saw it,
ignoring you seemed like the best way
to achieve that outcome.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_150.text: Look, all I want to do is find my cat and bolt. So if you want me gone, and I want me gone, we might as well work together! You can start by assigning your helper robot to aid in my search. And since getting rid of me seems to be your top priority or whatever, I don't see how you can refuse.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Now that we've got THAT settled,
I'm looking forward to working with
you, robot! What should I call you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_170.text:
I am B888888, but the members of Yellow
Division refer to me as 'Bean.'
Also, I never imagined you'd be so pushy
about all of this! Sheesh!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Bean, I'm looking for a cat.
Know where I can find one?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_190.text:
Though I don't know if it's the cat you seek,
but I have seen cat-like creatures on the
lower level. Let's take the Yellow Division
lift down and see what we can see.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Spriggans! They're creatures that eat gemstones,
so they're often found nibbling on Yellow
Division's precious-minerals collection—
which is a real bother, let me tell you. Oh, and their appetites are insatiable,
so it's quite possible they've eaten
your cat by mistake!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I do sense magical energy...
Yes! My cat may be here!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_020.text: Well, don't let me stop you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_000.text:
I don't think this one has
anything to do with your cat.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, let's just call it a hunch!
You'd be better off ignoring 'em.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_000.text: Well? Did you find your cat?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh? That's a drag. But you've still done
us a great service by getting rid of those
awful spriggans! Now let's gather up the
gem fragments they dropped.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Aw, don't look so glum.
There'll be other chances!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_000.text:
So I don't think those spriggan
creatures from before really have
anything to do with my cat.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Now now, don't be so hasty! The natures of
spriggans differ on an individual basis.
I mean, that one right over there could
have eaten your cat on a lark!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Aw, poor kitty! I guess I should
fight it to make sure, huh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_030.text:
That's right! You'll never know
for sure until you do!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_000.text: Well? Did you find your cat?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_010.text:
No, it's not here. Also, those spriggans
were the same as the ones before.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
