SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, how about that... But don't lose hope,
because there are still plenty more around!
Oh, but let's make sure to gather up these
gem fragments before we go find 'em, okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_000.text:
More spriggans, huh? I mean, I DO sense
magical energy again, but do you really
think that could've eaten my cat?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, for sure! There's truly
no end to their appetites.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_020.text:
But doesn't it seem WAY more likely that
rather than being inside of a spriggan,
it's literally anywhere else on Delta Base?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_030.text:
I mean, I guess that's possible.
But you also know what they say:
the third time's the charm!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_040.text:
Bean, are you SURE you aren't just trying
to get me to solve your spriggan problem
because you're tired of them munching on
all of your gemstones?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_050.text:
WHAAAAAAT!? I'm shocked! Shocked, I tell you!
Why, that couldn't be further from the truth!
All I'm doing here, alien, is trying to help
YOU find your missing cat! Also, that isn't just a 'gem' that thing
is eating—it's an invaluable specimen
known as the philosopher's stone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_060.text:
A philosopher's stone? Those are super rare!
I hear they produce magical energy, but I've
never actually seen one before.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_070.text:
If you've heard of it, then I'm sure you're
aware cats are drawn to philosopher's stones
like moths to a sodium arc lamp!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_080.text:
So why didn't you tell me that to begin with!?
I was starting to think I was being tricked,
and I didn't like it at ALL.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_090.text:
Tricked? Why, how dare you!
I would never DREAM of... Okay, fine. I tricked you. I had no idea if your
cat was down here, but I wanted to put your
alien strength to use. Sorry about that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_100.text:
Yeah, well, I guess the spriggans DO look
kind of like cats. I mean, from a distance.
And if you squint and wiggle your head.
Anyway, no worries.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_110.text:
I'm truly moved by your forgiveness,
alien, and refuse to believe your
presence here could possibly pose
any threat to Delta Base!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_120.text:
Aw, thanks for believing in me, Bean!
Now how about I drive away those
spriggans, and then you help me
find my cat for real!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, goodie! Thanks to you, we recovered
the pieces of some very precious stones!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_010.text:
As a witch, I certainly couldn't sit back
and watch some rando eat something as
powerful as a philosopher's stone!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_020.text:
But the thing's also in pieces,
so what should we do?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_050.text:
If you put all the pieces in the
correct place, the stone returns
to how it used to be! Yes, the philosopher's stone has some real magic,
all right. Er, but they don't snap together
by themselves, so you have to do it manually.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_070.text:
Whoa! I never imagined an alien like you would
possess such capabilities! Why, this could lead
to significant advances in our understanding of
the philosopher's stone, so thanks for that!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_080.text: This is MUCH harder than it looks.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_090.text:
If it's so difficult that even a Bean
Model-8 like myself struggles to put
it back together, it's no surprise
that you couldn't do it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_100.text:
I'll bring the philosopher's stone back,
and then we can get to work on
your spirit thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_120.text: Why is there a piece left over?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_130.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_130.text:
Well, since this is an honest-to-gosh
piece of a real philosopher's stone,
I guess I'll give it a good home.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_140.text:
I'll bring the pieces of the philosopher's stone
back, and then we can get to work on your
little spirit thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_000.text:
Good news, alien! I reported our latest
adventures to the overseer and handed
over the philosopher's stone you fixed. I thought for sure he'd be mad at me,
but he actually praised me instead! It seems
his whole ignore-the-alien order has been
completely forgotten.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_010.text:
What a fair-weather boss. Er, not that I
blame him for changing his tune, knowing
how valuable philosopher's stones can be.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_020.text:
Regardless, it is no longer necessary
for you to quickly conclude your
business and leave Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, but there was a piece of bad news at the
end: The overseer ordered me to start prepping
the next experiment, so our cat search will
have to wait until that's finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_040.text:
Hey, I understand. I'll just wander
around Delta Base for a bit then.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I bring good tidings, alien! The overseer's
health has improved, and he'll officially
be resuming his duties today!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Are you sure you're up for this,
Mr. Overseer? I don't want you
to push yourself too hard.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_020.text:
While I admit I'm pushing myself somewhat,
the mental anguish from staying cooped up
in that medical facility would be far worse
for me in the long run. Now then, Bean. Isn't there an
additional piece of news to share?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Indeed there is! We've had a breakthrough
in our research into the cursed tomes,
and now know it's connected to our
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is an
anatomical model made of a rare metal
called orichalcum. Please note that while we believe the
skeleton to be man-made, it is not a
human skeleton, and therefore does not
resemble either you or the overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_050.text:
The skeleton contains means of
both locomotion and communication. As such, it is likely modeled after an
exoskeletal life-form, with an appearance
indicative of the beings that inhabit
the world on which it was created.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_060.text: Wow, there were a lot of big words in that sentence. So how is this...thing... connected to the cursed tomes?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh, right! See, when I read through the
ancient tomes to verify their contents,
I wasn't cursed in the same way the
fleshy researchers were. Instead, the transformative functions of
the tome activated my internal mechanisms!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_080.text:
You don't look any different to me,
Bean. What exactly got activated?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Whaaat? You can't even tell that
my processing speed has tripled!? No, that's a joke. I was already
fully activated, so there was no
visible effect.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_100.text: But it did give us the idea of using the tome's curse on the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! And upon further investigation, we found numerous commonalities that suggest the specimen and cursed tomes are connected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_110.text:
In summation, we believe the curse
in the ancient tomes is, in fact,
an activation command for the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_120.text:
What an incredible discovery! That must be 
exactly the sort of thing you Yellow Division
guys dream about when you come to work.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Oh, but our research doesn't end with
this revelation, alien! We intend to
use the curse to attempt to activate
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Only one way to find out! Because whether it
works or not, the important thing is that
we try. Isn't that right, Overseer?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Exactly so, Bean. I appreciate how you
have a wonderful way of saying things
I often struggle to express. Now then, alien. If you are ready,
I would very much like you to witness
our grand experiment.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_170.text: I'll witness the heck out of it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_190.text:
All necessary preparations
have been made.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_000.text: Alien! We must speak of the sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_010.text: Are you feeling better, Mr. Overseer?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_020.text:
My physical condition is irrelevant!
All that matters is that the sword is
innately connected to the Orichalcum
Skeletal Specimen! Now tell me everything you know about
the specimen, and do not lie!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_030.text: Uh, sorry. It's connected to what?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is a
skeleton created from a rare metal
called orichalcum.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_050.text:
It contains means of both locomotion and
communication, and we believe it to be an
anatomical model of an exoskeletal life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Don't play dumb with me, alien!
I know you really came here to recover
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! But as I'm about to prove, we have already
solved its mystery—and we have no intention
of returning it to you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_070.text: Well, how fun. You do that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_090.text:
Bean, I like you and all, but I think I'm done
playing Yellow Division's games.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_100.text:
No! Please don't say that!
Just come observe this one experiment!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_110.text:
No! I'm tired of being chewed out by
your jerkface overseer. What did I ever
do to deserve that, huh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_120.text:
But if something goes wrong with the experiment,
Yellow Division will need help dealing with it—
and the overseer is too proud to seek aid from
the Administrative or any other division!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_130.text:
Bean, YOU'RE from Administrative Division,
and YOU'RE helping him!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_140.text:
Sure, but I'm sort of a special case because
I was involved with reassembling the sword.
Please help me here! I'm begging you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_170.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_170.text: I appreciate you even considering it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_180.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_180.text:
Please help me out here, alien!
I'm begging you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_000.text:
A moment, alien! I heard what happened with
the philosopher's stone. Your hard work was very
much appreciated, and I apologize for suggesting
you might bring misfortune to Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_010.text:
I did what anyone would have done
to save such a valuable item.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_020.text:
As I gazed upon the restored stone,
I suddenly recalled the Orichalcum 
Skeletal Specimen whose study we had
neglected for so many years. I was struck with an intuitive sense 
that this was the key to its mystery!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is an
anatomical model made of a rare metal
called orichalcum. Please note that while we believe the
skeleton to be man-made, it is not a
human skeleton, and therefore does not
resemble either you or the overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_050.text:
The skeleton contains means of both
locomotion and communication. As such, it is likely modeled after an
exoskeletal life-form, with an appearance
indicative of the beings that inhabit
the world on which it was created.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_060.text:
I believe we can use the power of the
philosopher's stone to set the skeletal
model in motion, giving us valuable clues
into the civilization that created it. Oh, but I could not be more
excited about the prospect!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_070.text:
The experiment's all ready to go, alien,
so we're hoping you might do us the
honor of observing it with us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So this is your skeletal specimen?
Looks mechanical to me, but what
do I know about stuff like this?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It sure does, doesn't it!? But that strong
mechanical appearance is an aspect our
cultural researchers had to shed their
preconceived assumptions about. See, because whoever made the specimen
clearly felt it was skeletal in nature,
not mechanical.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Now let us begin the activation of
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! I will read from the cursed tome.
That way, should anything go wrong,
the sacrifice will be mine alone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_030.text:
For when I said I had recovered, that was
a lie. One way or the other, this will be
my final duty for Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The curse... I can feel it...
Agh! Such...pain! But I must continue! Before long, 
the transformation...should...begin...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_080.text:
The overseer's down, Bean! Stop the
experiment—it's too much for him!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_100.text: Oh wow! That was the overseer!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Ah, of course! I am now inside
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! As I suspected, the curse was never a curse
at all, but merely a way for the people of
that world to transfer themselves into a
new exoskeleton.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Nice job, Overseer. The experiment was a
success! Now please share your observations
with us so we can take notes.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_140.text:
I am gradually beginning to understand how
this skeleton works. At the brink of death,
I have been freed from my withered, useless
body and awakened inside a new one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_150.text:
You're blowing my mind here, Overseer!
I mean, with that new skeleton, you might
be able to live on forever!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_160.text:
I'm not sure that would be
such a good thing, Bean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Hmm? Who are you? What are
all of you doing in...?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Overseer? What's happening?
Who are you talking to?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_190.text:
No... No! I'm not alone in this body!
There are hundreds—no, thousands
of others...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_210.text:
Uh-oh. The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is attempting to access Delta Base's
information networks.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_220.text:
The overseer hasn't taken over that
skeleton thing—the skeleton thing
is taking over the overseer!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_230.text:
Correct... Cannot defy the majority...
Cut us off... Protect...Delta...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_250.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_250.text:
I am acting as fast as my
processors allow, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_260.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_260.text:
The specimen intends to use the overseer's
knowledge to take over Delta Base. You must
physically cut Yellow Division off from the
network in order to protect it. I will attempt to interfere with the
specimen's communications systems
in order to buy you time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_270.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_270.text:
I'll work as fast as I can,
alien, but please hurry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_000.text:
For so many years, the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen has stood as a great mystery even
within Yellow Division's varied collection. But now, its connection to the reassembled
sword is clear: we can expect that the
interdimensional energy pulses released by
the blade will activate its skeletal frame.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Now, let us begin the experiment.
Bean, do not forget to document
everything. And...begin resonating!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes, it is exactly as predicted...
As the sword and I resonate together,
so too does the skeletal frame. This sword is the key that bonds
the skeleton to its wielder.
Increase the resonance!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_040.text:
The overseer's down! Stop the experiment,
Bean—this is too much for him to handle
in his condition!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Uh-oh. That voice is coming from the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen, but it
sounds like the overseer!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_070.text:
Correct, Bean. I am now within the specimen.
Or perhaps it would be more accurate to say
that the specimen is now I? Behold, alien! I have achieved the full
integration with the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen which you could not!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_080.text:
Buddy, if you think I WANTED to fuse myself
to some creepy skeleton, I don't even know
what to tell you. But now that you're in
there, what do you intend to do?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_090.text:
I'm going to infiltrate the core systems
of Delta Base and take control of all of its
functions! Such a feat will be a simple task
inside my new body.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_100.text:
Once I am in full command of Delta Base,
I will begin my advance into all the other
worlds, thereby bringing their civilizations
under my control as well!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_110.text:
Wow, what an idiot.
What should we do, Bean?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_130.text:
Sorry! I'm currently in the process of
diverting all the skeleton's connection
requests through me in hopes of slowing
his access to Delta Base's systems!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_140.text:
And while you're busy doing that,
I'll put a stop to him! Until then,
give me everything you've got, Bean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the skeleton thing? It looks
more like... I dunno. A crab or spider
or something like that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, I'd love to know what sort of civilization
these people created—and I bet reactivating this
skeleton will tell us all about it! The overseer
is a genius for thinking up this plan!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Thank you, Bean. And now that I have the
philosopher's stone, let us begin our activation
of the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_030.text:
It was a wise choice to build the frame
out of orichalcum. It is extremely durable,
yet adaptable enough to meet the needs
of multiple civilizations. However...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_050.text:
It almost sounds like HE was
the one who built this thing!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_060.text:
We didn't have the energy source to power
the orichalcum frame, and so were only
able to operate it briefly. Now that we have the philosopher's stone,
however, its power should ensure a
sufficient duration of operability.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_080.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is now online.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_090.text: The overseer's been pulled into it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Analyzing all information... Overseer...
Yellow Division... Delta Base...
Organizational structure... Analysis complete. Placing Delta Base
under our authority.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_110.text:
Uh-oh! The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is
attempting to access Delta Base's information
network! Attempting to cut off accyrk•#

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_120.text:
Infiltrat*t5 Delta $9wBase netwo4u@%*8$ym.
Please physically sever Yellow Divisio*5n
from netw0r# to protect Delta Ba3&^j.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_000.text:
Here's the control panel. Cutting power
to this should do the trick.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_010.text:
Okay, two more control panels to find.
Man, Delta Base feels like a really
big place all of a sudden.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_020.text:
Okay, just one more panel to find.
Sure wish there was some magic spell
that could just poof me over to it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_030.text:
Okay, that should keep Delta Base
from being taken over by that thing!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_040.text:
I sure hope Bean's doing okay.
I should hurry back and check on him!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_000.text:
Bean! I'm back! All of Yellow Division
is now cut off from the network!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_010.text:
Confirming isolationlationlationlation...
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen sevevevevered...
...Hmm? My processessessing speed appears to
be dropping. Initiating reboooooot...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_020.text:
So what am I supposed to do about THAT!?
...Bean!? Gah, he's in his reboot cycle!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_030.text:
I guess it's up to me to stop it...
If this destroys something irreplaceable,
I'm sorry and you can bill me later!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_010.text:
&j823 network #2uf&& secured.
Plea$3se stop ^4r6 Orich*1hym
Sk3#4tal Specim*n.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_020.text:
Not sure what I'm supposed to do here,
but don't blame me if I have to completely
destroy the dang thing!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_000.text:
If we lifted the curse, the transformation
should reverse and return the overseer
to his former body.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Alas, that does not appear to be the case.
That curse truly was a curse—or perhaps it
was a punishment. This body is a prison. I will be
captive here forever, with no hope
of escape or death.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_020.text:
You've done nothing to deserve such
a lousy punishment! Is there really
no way for you to escape?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_030.text:
Thank you for saying so, alien. However,
I am now able to visualize the culture that
felt it necessary to create such a prison. Once I am able to communicate with the others 
trapped in here, I look forward to continuing
my research. Therefore, I view this not as a
punishment, but as an opportunity.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen will soon
shut down and enter an eternal slumber.
Thank you, alien. Farewell, Bean.
Glory to Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_050.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is now offline.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Don't blame yourself for this, alien:
the die was cast the moment the overseer
transferred himself into the skeleton. In fact, you were right to put
a stop to it when you did!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_070.text:
I never thought you'd be the one reassuring
me, Bean. But believe this: I'm never going
to forget Delta Base OR the overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_000.text:
Your stupid dream of conquest is over, Overseer!
Now get back in your own body!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_010.text:
Vile alien! I will never permit the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen to fall
into your treacherous hands!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_020.text:
I can't believe the overseer hated me
so much he'd actually self-destruct just
to get the last word. Sorta sucks.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_030.text:
Don't blame yourself, alien.
That sort of paranoia has always been
part of the overseer's general nature. Between his sickness and his advanced age,
I'm guessing he just couldn't hold it
back anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_040.text:
Plus, who knows what effect the
sword and skeleton had on him?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_050.text:
So you think the sword and skeleton
managed to take control of him?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_060.text:
I think it's a strong possibility, sure.
But I'd like to reassemble both artifacts
to investigate them further.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_070.text:
But they've been blown to bits!
That'll take forever!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh, it's a trivial matter for the researchers
of Yellow Division. In fact, that's just the
sort of thing they live for!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_000.text:
I knew something was up the moment the
overseer had that attitude adjustment.
...Hey! Overseer! Can you still hear me?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_010.text:
I was ensnared by the power
of the philosopher's stone and
set these events in motion. To everyone in Yellow Division, I am
deeply sorry. My behavior has been a
disgrace to all of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_020.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_020.text:
And yet, alien, this all came to pass because
of your presence. Had you not come here,
I never would have touched the stone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_030.text: Forgive me for saying so, Overseer, but this all would have happened eventually even without the alien! In fact, her being here saved us all from a much greater disaster!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_040.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_040.text:
Heed me, all members of Yellow Division!
You are to have nothing to do with the alien!
That is my final order.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_050.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_050.text:
The philosopher's stone is running out
of energy... Ah, but this is a surprise...
I expected it to last longer...

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_060.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
has gone offline.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_070.text:
And sorry, alien, but until a new overseer
is chosen, the orders of the former one
have to remain in effect—which means I
won't be able to help you anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_080.text:
That's okay, Bean. The overseer was stubborn,
but he may have been right when he said that
my coming here made all of this happen. And because of that, I'd better find
my cat and move on from Delta Base
as soon as I can.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_000.text:
Congratulations! I received word
from Administrator Gold that you
have found your cat.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_010.text:
Thanks, Bean. I'm glad that worked out,
but I sure wish some other things could
have gone differently.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Don't worry about the overseer!
One day, Yellow Division will find a way
to safely reactivate the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen and reunite with our overseer. And when that happens, all the mysteries
of the skeleton will be solved.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_030.text:
You know what? I bet you will—
'cause you Yellow Division types
are just that incredible! So when that day comes, tell the
overseer I think he's great, okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_040.text:
I certainly will! But for now,
I take it it's time for you to
continue your own journey?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_050.text:
Yeah, I'm afraid this is goodbye.
Take care, Bean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh! Heya, alien! I was so focused on my
repair work that I didn't notice you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_030.text:
You sure got to work on that fast!
You're gonna be finished in no time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_040.text:
I've only achieved 0.01% of the desired result.
Sadly, I cannot even begin to calculate when
my duties might be finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, however long it takes,
I know you'll get there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_060.text:
Thank you, alien. And I understand you
found your cat? I'm happy for you,
but I guess that means your business
on Delta Base is concluded.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_070.text:
That's why I'm here, Bean: I've come
to say goodbye, and also to thank you
for everything.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh, it's we in Delta Base who should be
grateful to you! Should you visit us again,
your registration will be complete, and you
will no longer be referred to as 'alien.'

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_090.text:
Neat! Then the next time I see you,
call me Ameya, okay? Bye, Bean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_000.text: What are you doing here, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm leaving Delta Base, so I thought
I'd stop by and say goodbye.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_020.text:
Is that so? How unexpected.
Well, goodbye.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_030.text:
Aw, come on Bean, don't be cold!
Also, what happened with the whole
orichalcum skeleton thing, huh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_050.text:
What!? Why!? I thought Yellow Division
was determined to learn everything
they could about it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_060.text:
There is no purpose in keeping unneeded
things lying about. It is only logical
that they be disposed of.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_070.text:
Okay, well, I had a lot more to say to you,
but you're clearly not in the mood.
So, uh, see ya, I guess.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_080.text:
...Did the alien see through
my clever facade?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_090.text:
Just to be safe, I'll do some meddling when
she enters the connectivity gate to ensure
she becomes lost in the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This must be the cell where the overseer
said an alien was being held.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Hellooo? Is anyone inside? Hmm. No answer. But I don't sense
any monsters in there, either.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Desperate to read more already?
You need to wait until next week
for the new chapter!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Wait, you're a writer? Oh man, are they
keeping you locked up in here until you
produce some kind of masterwork!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_060.text:
No one is 'keeping me locked up.'
I took up residency here myself to
escape distraction and focus on work.
Are you not one of my usual readers?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Guess not? My name's Ameya,
I'm a witch from Pulchra.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_080.text:
A witch from Pulchra!? Remarkable!
For you see, the magical world of Pulchra
is the setting of my novels: a fantastical
kingdom inhabited solely by witches!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Uh, okay? But Pulchra is very much real.
Hmm... Yeah, there's something strange
about you. Are you a witch yourself?
Or maybe a squire?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Me? A witch? Don't make me laugh!
Magic isn't real, much less an entire
world full of it! No, I fear Pulchra has never existed
outside of the pages of my novels.
Incidentally, what is a 'squire'?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Squires are residents of Pulchra who
can't use magic. But you already knew
that, didn't you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_120.text:
No, because in MY Pulchra, everyone CAN
use magic. Also, all the witches are spunky
young women with sass for days! And sure, maybe a few seem mean or aloof,
but in the end, they all band together
to overcome the Calamity.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_130.text:
In fact, I'm building up to the climax
right now, and our adorable witch heroines
are dropping like flies. Oh, I can barely
stand to write such heartbreak!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Interesting how your precious realism
only applies when it's convenient
for your stories.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Welcome to the world of creating art, dear!
No reader can emotionally connect to a work
of entirely made-up nonsense—you need to
at least ground it in SOME kind of reality.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Lots of people live their lives desperately
fighting against the hard truths of reality,
you know. Maybe you should try to live
in the real world yourself sometime.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Thank you for your valuable advice,
Ameya, Witch of Pulchra. And for it,
I would like you to have this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_190.text:
A little gift I give my biggest fans.
Thanks for being such a loyal reader!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Okay, what the heck was that,
and why did it make me so angry?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: LoLo
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_210.text:
An embittered squire, probably. Good for
her for leaving Pulchra, but it seems like
the only home she ever found was a fantasy
ideal of how she wanted Pulchra to be.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_220.text:
Well, that's sad. But GAH! What am I
supposed to do with all this anger
I feel towards her now, LoLo!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_000_CUT_000_230.text:
Everyone returns to Pulchra in the end.
In fact, I'd like to return myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_OLD_001_CUT_000_000.text: So this is a gift for her readers?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Connection_Operator
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Alert! Alert! An unapproved external
connection has been made from outside
the connectivity gate.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Connection_Boss
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Impossible. No one has forced their
way through the connectivity gate
for 15,462 cycles.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Connection_Boss
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
External lock disengaged.
Our commands are being overridden.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
All security teams, assemble at the
connectivity gate! Anti-alien protocols
have been initiated!

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.text:
Super nice that it's just
a normal door this time!

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.text:
Well, at least the door was normal...
Nope! That's rude. Have to remember
that to them, I'M what's abnormal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.text:
Scanning. Trespasser does not match
known records of Delta Base members.
Alien status confirmed.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_04.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_04.text:
Yikes! There's an alien!?
...Oh, wait. That's me, isn't it?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.text:
The alien will be interrogated by the
Council of Overseers. They will decide
the means of its disposal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.text:
DISPOSAL!? Sheesh, sounds like
I'm in trouble already!

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_00.text:
The fate of captive aliens is determined
by the Detention Division. With infiltrating
aliens, however, the Council of Overseers
has jurisdiction.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_01.text: And if we fail to reach consensus?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_02.text:
If you entrust the matter to
the Administrative Division,
we will handle disposal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_03.text:
Disposal sounds good to me—where does trash
belong but in the trash can? Then we can pretend
this unapproved external connection never
happened and all walk away happy.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_04.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_04.text:
If we simply ignore what happened,
it could easily pave the way to
our own destruction.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_05.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_05.text:
This incident also calls our own ethics into
question. How can we allow ourselves to intrude
upon other worlds if we refuse to grant the
same privilege to others?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_06.text:
Oh, okay. So you two lofty overseers think
it's just peachy keen to let this alien
run around harassing us? The thing won't shut up about looking
for her lost cat, which we all know to
be complete and utter nonsense!

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_07.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_07.text:
Alien, if you have knowledge of some
magical cat existing on Delta Base, 
I would have you share your evidence.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_08.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_08.text:
Okay, so this is gonna sound a little weird,
but whenever I'm guided by fate to a door
and it opens, it means that one of my cats
is in the world on the other side. Thing is, I don't know for sure if it's
in THIS base, specifically. It might be
somewhere outside of it.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_09.text: I'm sorry. Outside the base? Ha ha ha! Did you hear that!?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_10.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_10.text:
Delta Base has no 'outside,' alien.
The only thing connected to the exterior
is the door you came through.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_11.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_11.text:
Then I guess that means my cat's here!
So hey, all I need is permission to look
for it. Soon as I find it, I'll be out of your
hair and on my way.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_12.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_12.text:
Oh, suuure! We'll just let an alien
wander freely around Delta Base
doing whatever it pleases! I don't know where you come from,
alien, but we have rules here!
Very important rules!

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_13.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_13.text:
Would it be acceptable to assign her
a monitor? Yellow Division excels at
cross-cultural communication, yes?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_14.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_14.text:
A monitor without the capability
to fight would serve no purpose.
It should come from Red Division.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_15.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_15.text:
Sure, we can fight—but no one
actually knows the rules better
than the Administrative Division!

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_16.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_16.text:
The Council of Overseers has reached its
decision. The Administrative Division will
assign a monitor to the alien, and she
will be allowed to search for her cat.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_17.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_17.text:
Understood. As the Administrative
Division's representative, I will
assign a monitor to the alien.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_00.text:
I'm Administrator Gold, your assigned monitor.
I ask that you complete your task quickly,
alien, as I have little free time to spare.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_01.text:
So this is called Delta Base? It doesn't
seem like the sort of world where I'll
find any mana, so I'll just grab my cat
and get out of here.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
The Council of Overseers has granted
you permission to search for a cat—
and that is all you are allowed to do.
Is this understood?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Okay, but could you tell that to the
other divisions, then? Because all
I'm doing is helping out with all of
their stupid problems!

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
The Administrative Division does not interfere
in the business of other divisions. Ours is a
support role only, and I lack the authority
to issue orders.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Have you truly come here for the purpose
of finding a cat? Because I sense very
little energy being devoted to that task.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Believe me, I would love to find that cat and
get out of here, but everyone keeps giving me
things to do! Guess it's just one of those
things popular girls have to deal with.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
I understand this sentiment. The Administrative
Division is also constantly fielding requests
from the other divisions while asking nothing
in return.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Perhaps it's time you got serious
about this cat search of yours.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Yeah, I think you're probably right.
But I can't shake the feeling there's
something else I need to do here!

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
If this is your attitude, you should consider
joining the Administrative Division—although
I can't say I've ever heard of us employing
outsiders before.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Explain yourself, alien. Why have the
other divisions had nothing but trouble
from the moment you arrived?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
I should be asking you that—I keep getting
dragged into one dumb crisis after another!
I'm sure never going to forget Delta Base,
you can believe that.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, I suppose that is not such a bad thing—
though perhaps this is simply what happens
when you dilly-dally on your supposedly urgent
cat search. Now pick up the pace, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.text:
I did not wish to go to the lower level,
so please explain why I am being made to
do so. Is your magical cat down there?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh? Why are you so reluctant to go to
the lower level? Is it gross down there?
Ooo, or is it dangerous!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.text:
It is both dangerous and dirty, and not
a place for an administrator like myself.
Conclude your business there quickly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_010_CUT_000.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_010_CUT_000.text:
I could avoid visiting the awful lower
level altogether had you managed to find
your cat during one of your previous trips.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_010_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_010_CUT_000.text:
Man, don't yell at me! There's all sorts
of stuff going on down there and it's a
gigantic confusing mess!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_010_CUT_000.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_010_CUT_000.text:
The other divisions are free to use the lower
level as they please, which is why we do
only the minimum amount of necessary
maintenance there. I hope you will complete
your work in short order.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_GET_NEKO_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_GET_NEKO_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Then it's finally done? A relief.
Let us return to the upper level
as quickly as possible.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_GET_NEKO_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_GET_NEKO_000_CUT_000_0.text: I'm ready to be on my way.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks for all your help finding
my cat, Administrator Gold. Bye!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Wait. If you do not connect to the gate
with great care, you will end up lost
in the Conjoined Worlds. Stay here and I will summon assistance
from the Administrative Division overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Aw, I'll be fine. But hey, have you ever
visited the Lost Realms? Or, you know?
Whatever it is you guys call what's
behind that door.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Members of the Administrative Division
do not leave Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
But don't you ever wonder
what it's like outside?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I have served the same role in the
Administrative Division since the moment
I was born, and will continue to do so
until all my higher functions cease. It took 8,000 cycles before I was promoted and
made an administrator—which is regarded as an
unusually fast ascent—and I have now served
as said administrator for over 5,000 cycles.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
But this 'outside' of yours.
Is it...fun?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I don't know how to compare the outside
world to Delta Base, but I sure like it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Uh-oh. Sounds like someone's approaching.
Hurry! Are you coming with me or not?

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Understood. I will accompany
you and see the outside.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks for all your help finding
my cat, Administrator Gold. Bye!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Wait. If you do not connect to the gate
with great care, you will end up lost
in the Conjoined Worlds. Stay here and I will summon assistance
from the Administrative Division overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_020.text: Aw, I'll be fine. Take care!

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_030.text:
The alien has departed.
What an unusual life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_CUT_000_040.text:
You will now return to your
normal duties, Administrator Gold.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_02.text:
I guess the door's the only
thing that's normal here.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_03.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_03.text:
Entry not found in Delta Base registry.
Alien status confirmed.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_05.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_05.text:
Aliens must be monitored at all times.
Please follow all applicable rules.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_06.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_06.text:
Hey, you got it, fella.
By the way, where are we?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_00.text:
I am Administrator Gold, your assigned
monitor. You are here in search of a
'magical cat,' yes? Can such a creature
truly be found in Delta Base?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_02.text:
In that case, I ask that you find
it quickly, for I am very busy. My coworkers are envious of my having been
given the 'easy' role of a monitor, but I fail
to see what is so enviable about it—for when it
is done, I will still have piles of missed work.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
Pssst! You can trust me with your true secret
objective for coming here, alien. Are you a
spy sent from another base? Or a saboteur?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text: Do I look like I'm some sort of military operative? C'mon.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
I apologize for the implication.
But what about you having been
sent to us by another base?
Was I correct about that part?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_03.text:
Disposal? Are you nuts!?
That would be a huge waste! Look, I'm sure we can find some use for the alien.
Maybe it could teach in Yellow Division's Academy
of Foreign Cultures? Oh, or we could use it as
breeding stock for Green Division!

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_04.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_04.text:
Yellow Division wants nothing
to do with this.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_05.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_05.text:
First of all, kindly stop referring to our
life-cycle research specimens as 'stock.'
Secondly, we have no plans of using the
alien in any of our research.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_06.text:
Seriously? You're gonna let a chance
like this slip through your fingers? Well, if you're really not interested,
I'm sure you won't object if we in
Red Division put the alien to good use!

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_07.text:
Until your cat is located, alien,
you may stay here in Delta Base
for as long as you like.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_08.text:
Assign her a caretaker from the
Administrative Division, would you?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_09.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_09.text:
A monitor, you mean? Yes, we'll
ensure she's assigned a monitor.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_00.text:
I am Administrator Gold, and I have been
assigned as your monitor. But as I have no
interest whatsoever in monitoring you,
feel free to do as you please.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_01.text:
That sounds great to me,
but are YOU sure about it?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_02.text:
Just don't cause any trouble. If anything
goes wrong, I'm the one who's going to
be chewed out by my bosses.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.text:
Of course not! I won't cause
you any trouble at all!

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.text: Good. That's what I like to hear.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_04.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_04.text: I find it to be surprisingly normal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_08.text:
I hereby declare today to be Alien
Appreciation Day! Hip hip, huzzah!

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_09.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_09.text:
All right, that's more than enough of...
whatever this is. This alien isn't some
amusingly exotic species—it's a terribly
dangerous life-form. For all we know, it's swarming with germs
and pathogens. It may even seek to destroy
us through cultural pollution or weapons
of mass destruction that it smuggled in. But do not worry: the Administrative
Division is on top of the matter.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_00.text:
Greetings. I am Administrator Gold,
and I will be your attendant. ...Attendant to an alien. Wow.
I'm probably never going to
have a duty like this again.

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_01.text:
I take it outsiders don't pop
into Delta Base very often?

SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_02.text:
It has never happened in all the cycles I
have been here, which makes this all rather
exciting. So welcome to Delta Base, alien!
